• Preface
  • Timeline of development
  • Tactical specifications
  • What's what?
    • MBR Sector
    • PBR Sector
      • Attention! FileI system should be exactly FAT32, not MSDOS, for FAT16 is unacceptable.
    • Boot or CloverEFI
    • CLOVERIA32.efi and CLOVERX64.efi or CloverGUI
    • Daddy's work
    • EFI Driver
    • Download cupcakes

    • Details
    • Writing codes

    • Making a DEBUG version of Clover
  • Installation
    • Usingan installer
      • People, for God's sake, don't tick this box, even if you havea computer with UEFI BIOS.
    • Installing the loader manually
      • Osx
      • Installation on the FAT32 section.
      • For owners of hard drives with a sector size of 4k.
      • Installation on exFAT section
      • Linux
      • Windows
    • Recommended installation options
      • Never put any section active!

    • Choosing a theme

  • Sleep problem
    • Hibernet
  • How to use
    • First acquaintance
    • Why is Clover running so slowly?
      • 1. On display debug.log.
      • 2. There are too many drives, sections and files on them.
      • 3. Huge Windows or Linux section, and not even onein.
      • 4. Too many drivers in the folder /EFI/CLOVER/drivers/
      • 5. Unsupportedmouse.
      • 6. Slow driver HFS.
      • 7. Chosen monstrously beautiful theme design.
      • 8. Use the newest Clover.
    • Analyzing Debug.log/Preboot.log
    • Launch OSX on unsupported iron
      • Unsupported video ofart.
    • Block cupcake
    • Slot name (AAPL, slot-name)
    • HDMI sound
    • The start-up sound of the computer
    • NVRAM, iMessage, multiboot
      • Remember the general rule: dynamic data takes precedence over static data.
    • Using multiple configurations
    • How to make boot.efi not too spamming on the screen?
      • debug=value
  • Faq
    • B. I want to try Clover, where to start?
    • Which clover version is best suited to my iron?
    • B. Doesn't work.
    • B. Clover installed, but gets a black screen.
    • I see on the screen 6 and nothing else happens.
    • B. There is a download only to the text analogue of BIOS with five points, the top - Continue'gt;
    • V. Usdanced Clover on a flash drive, loaded with it, and do not see his HDD.
    • B. At UEF-download I do not see a section with Makosia, only legasi.
    • B. At UEFI-booting Windowes looks like a legasi, although it is EFI.
    • B. Put his native resolution in the loader, but the screen is in a black frame.
    • B. When you try to swellthe OSI hangs on the black screen
    • B. The core begins to load, but panics after the tenth line Unable To find a driver for this platform "ACPI".
    • B. The system starts to load, but stops at still waiting for root device....
    • B. The system is loaded before the message: Waiting for DSMOS....
    • B. The system passes this message, but nothing changes further, although Winchester buzzes as if the system is loaded.
    • B. The system is loaded to the message: "Bluetooth controller....
    • B. The system is loaded, everything is fine, but the System Profiler errors ...
  • Conclusion
    • Chameleon.
    • Other EFI loaders.
Clover khaki
Written by Slice
Translated from Russian using the built-in
Microsoft Word document translation tools.
Original official document -
https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/Clover

14
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Preface
What are we talking about? Yes, of course not about the flower growing in the meadow to
the delight of cows. We are talking about software, about the loader of operating systems, tothe back
allows on a normal computer to run an unusual system - Mac OSX. Apple does not allow this to
happen, primarily because "we cannot keep computers that are not manufactured by Apple
working." Well, we puttheinstum at your own risk.
To download Makos on Hakintosha, you need a special loader, there are many
different, but at its core can be divided into two classes: FakeEFI and RealEFI. FakeEFI
was invented by David Elliot many years ago, and acted on a simple principle:
Let's pretend that we have EFI has already workedtala, leave in memory traces of its activities
(boot-args and all the tree tables), leave in the memory of EfiRuntime in a simplified form "Not
supported" and launch the coreof themach_kernel.
January 2013: It happened! iMessage stopped working because he definitely needs SetVariable,
which in Chameleon "Ne is supported."
RealEFI would have to be stitched instead of BIOS, but forthose withbios-based motherboards
invented the downloadable EFI. This EFI download system on a machine with BIOS was invented
by Intel, an open source project on the tianocore.org website. (The original project has sunk into
oblivion! catcher). Actually, this loader is called DUET. But here's the trouble, EFI is something it
loads, but the download of the operating system Mac OSX is not provided there. The next step is to
adapt DUET to Mac OSX requirements. EFI's new motherboards are alreadyavailable, but it's also
unsuitable for Hkintosh downloads. Clover serves for both categories.
The name Clover owes this uploader to one of thekabyl's project founders, who saw the
similarity of the "Command" key, existing only on the Macs, with the four-leaf clover.
The four-layer cleaveris a single clover plant with at least
one four-plate
leaf,unlike the
usual three-platedinch.
In
Western
tradition,
there is
a belief
that
the plant brings good luck to the founder, especially if it is found by
accident.
According to legend, each of the records of the four-plate sheet represents
something concrete: the first
- hope,the second - faith,the third - love,and the fourth - good luck.
By the way, the original green logo looks more like a hare than a clover. Namely Oxalis, and it is in flower shops as
three-leaf and four-leaf :)
In Russian version, we call the loader "Clover." I mean, not Clover. Project
development is on the forums
1 I wonder how you can find a clover by accident? Regularly pinch the grass in the meadow?!
15
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=2562&st=0
RIP https://applelife.ru/threads/clover.42089/
http://sourceforge.net/projects/cloverefiboot/
https://www.insanelymac.com/forum/327-clover/
https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/CloverBootloader
There are still a lot of forums with a smart look telling about Clover, but they have nothing to do with
real developers.
By TexThat Book:
Red highlights what you need to pay attention to. The color of the moderator. Green, what is
out of date and no longer supported is stored in the text for reference. Mould color.
The blue highlights are the headlines.
Black fat highlightedkeywords.
Timeline of development
The need for a new loader arose from Chameleon's inability to download the then-emerging
10.7 (Lion) system.
The project started on March 4, 2011 on the initiative of Kabyl, who, however, telling
all that he had managedtodo by that time, from the development evaded, and soon disappeared
altogether.
The first launch of the MacOSX system was modified dueT on April 6, 2011.
http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php? showtopic=2008&view=findpost&p=13810
On May 4, serious problems of the new loader were formulated, without their solution
there was no sense in the new project. The pause lasted until August, for itseemed unrealistic to
deal with these problems alone.
Meanwhile, Chameleon came to life, having coped with Lyon's boot, and I worked on my
brunch for a while. However, the administrators of chameleon ignored me, so I gave it up. Then
There was Ninzya with hisiBoot, and I joined him in trying to make an EFI-bootloader and solve
the hanging problems.
August 9, 2011 with the participation of dmdimon made a Russian font for the loader. In the
meantime, I'm doing SMBIOS and ACPI at a much higher level than I did in Chameleon.
October 19, 2011 finally solved the sampleof the lem launch Of Blow on a laptop.
November 14, 2011 the appearance of cats in the interface of Clover. That is for 10.4 draw
Tiger, for 10.5 Leopard and so on. It's a nice innovation! Appearance plays a role.
On December 14, 2011, the problem of panicand memory on the junior OSX systems, lyon
and older such problems for some reason was not solved.
05 January 2012 solved the problem of sleep. It was from that moment that the project could
be considered viable. By this time, Ninzja had already left the stage, and I decided to start my own
project of the uploader's graphics menu based on the already known rEFIt. He
16
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
licensed clean, and now it was possible to fight for international recognition of the project. That's
how Clover-v2 came about.
The new shell took two months to create, and the first publication took place on February
29, 2012. In fact, rEFIt already existed, itwasnot suitable for compilation in the EDK2
environment, and all its libraries had to be rewritten and replaced with their own. In the course of
cooperation with jadran, the project's compilation tools were developed. Now with the help of gcc-
4.4, and now 64 bits.
On March 9, 2012, Dmazar, who has known me since August 2011, joined the project
with his idea to make a UEFI loader based on Clover.
On March 31, 2012, Gyk did interactivity to enter the parameters in the loader shell -
Options Menu.
OnApril 1, 2012, a crazybirdy made Clover's installer.
On April 21, 2012, Dmazar defeated UEFI boot, but continued to work on the project
improve and correct. That is, OsxAptioFixDrv was created.
On June 5, 2012 pcj appeared and offered its sources with new technologies: DSDT patch,
Kexts Inject, Kernel patch, which took our loader to a whole new level, unattainable by competitors.
September 18, 2012. Pena called me and Dmazar tothink about the iCloud problem.
September 30, 2012 the appearance of a mouse in the loader
interface. On October 19, 2012, an animation was made in the
loader shell.
October - December 2012 step by step made a native resolution in the downloader dlI Nvidia,
ATI, Intel, for CloverEFI and for UEFI.
These achievements have raised the bar, as should be the graphical interface of a good loader.
I would also like to acknowledge Blackosx's contribution to improving support for topics.
January 9, 2013 solved the problem of paid iMessage, which could not be done in
Chameleon.
Spring 2013. With the efforts of JrCs Clover, theadditional utilities and
internationalization. 20 languages in the installer, control panel and automatic update service.
July 27, 2013 finally solved the problem of sleep at UEFI loading, hanging since the fall of
2012. It seems with the OS update appeared.
September 29, 2013 also corrected care to sleep, turn off and restart at UEFI loading. From
now on, you can put UEFIdownloads as the primary method on those computers where possible.
20 January 2014 is made the possibility of deep sleep - Hibernation. Not in all cases, but for
now Clover is the only loader that can.
February 2014. The "Project of the Month" awardis sorceforge.net.
17
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
April 5, 2014. The completion of the development was announced at the audit of 2652.
This, of course, does not negate possible improvements in the future, just nothing will change
drastically the basic already done.
June 2014. Apple laid out the 10.10DP1 Yosemite system, the first installation successes and
new fixes in Clover for the new system. And then it turned out that Chameleon is not able to
download this system. There are single successful reports from bareBoot and Ozmosis downloaders,
which are also EFI loaders using some of Clover's codes. Clover has become the main
Hakintoszewski downloader.
21 August 2014. Dmazar fixedthe NVRAM at UEFI download for some who didn't work
before.
Meanwhile, the 2k version overstepped 3,000 revisions. A new compiler with LTO
optimization, new code size, fixes of old bugs, improvements in algorithms. Almost nothing new,
but Clover got better.
January 2015. Once Clover-3, anothized by Apianti, is still not available, Clover-2 has
acquired a 2.3k version that reflects the revision of the zgt;3000.
All the developers dispersed, the site projectosx.com ceased to exist. I'm left alone, but I keep
workingat, albeit without much zeal.
June 2015. The 10.11 El Capitan system. Clover downloaded it without question.
The chameleon is stuck again. We did, but, as I see, the usual users do not show interest in
Chameleon. Interest is shown only by all the same 6 people who support him.
Chameleon/Chimera is still used by newcomers, Who started life with Multibista, and have not yet
heard about Clover, or users of AMD CPU, who are not developers, and they just do not know
what to do with Clover.
Spring 2016. We don't need gcc anymore.
Summer 2016. With the new coders, major new changes to Clover's interface.
Skroll wherever you need, checkboxes and radio boots, new styles of design.
Autumn 2016. Together with vit9696, the long-awaited support for FileVault2 technology
has been made.
Winter 2017. We went to audit 3999. Next will be 4000 and 2.4k version. Clover still
needsa re-implementation, because we need the support of new systems, so for Sierra 10.12.4, for
example, a new patch was needed.
Summer 2017. The Hi Sierra system with a new file system apfs has appeared. There is no
driver for Chameleon yet. For EFI downloaders there is a native of Apple. By the way, the multi-
player has long moved to Clover, as well as other commercial projects.
Autumn 2017. Victory over the black screen of the Radeons. This was done by vit9696 in
his WhateverGreen cupcake, Mieze told how it works, and I added as a tick in Clover's Configa
RadeonDeInit'true.
And again vit9696 found a solution how to fix AptioFix to work native NVRAM, now almost
everyone!
18
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Spring 2018. vit9696 figured out how RTC is used in macOS, and thus solved the problem
of hibernation key preservation, and other RTC problems.
June-December 2018. Support for SVG vector graphics, and, accordingly, scalable themes.
January 2019. The soundin Clover's interface, thanks to Goldfish64.
July 2019. A series of new download patches 10.15. And an audit of 5000! Now Clover has
received a 2.5k version.
May 2019. Vit9696 has created a new OpenCore loader on new ideas with itsideology,
it's more comprehensive, but Clover continues to live and develop.
I would like to note that Clover's comawas joined by Vector-sigma, who took over the entire user-
space.app. That is, controls everything that used to be under the tutelage of JrCs.
September 2019. We overhauled the entire project, moved to GitHub, which became a
stable and fast site after Microsoft bought it, and with it the following changes:
- Clover's sources are controlled not by the SVN protocol, but by the GIT protocol. This has its
drawbacks, namely the problem with the numbering of audits, but there are also advantages, such
as the ability to do a bisection to find a recently made error.
- tired of splashing around for strange "improvements" EDK2. Before that, used a stable
version of UDK2018, but it is clearly outdated, and with the new EDK2 Clover was simply
incompatible. It's about supporting legaic computers on Core2Duo and the like. Now
Clover does not need external libraries, everything you need to be in his repository, and all
this will be updated by Clover's developers, based on the changes in EDK2.
- nowthe main compiler of the project is gcc-10, unlike the Klang it is able to carry out
LinkTimeOptimisation, that is, discarding unused libraries during the linking phase. In doing
so, we get an additional diagonalof possibleerrors. And other bugs could have gone.
- The structure of the drivers' folders has been changed because we have completely abandoned the
idea of compiling 32bits, and the 64bit indication is redundant.
- The structure of kexts folders has been changed, and you can now connect and disable
different versions of cupcakes in the interface to check which one works best.
January 2020. Clover's next major transformation. There was a new developer Jief Machak, who
offered to transfer the project to CJ. It's non-trivial.
19
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
But it didn't come empty-handed, he brought the necessary files, dated 1997, obviously even then
solved the problem with CJ.
I accepted the challenge and here we are in the team have started the transformation in
Clover.
I have to use them. Let's leave Linus Torvalds alone with his curses to CJ, his motives are clear,
Linux is already written on C, and it is no longer remade, it remains only to look for this
justifiedand. We introduce new programming paradigms and rewrite codes for newrequirements.
that before could not untangle.
Summer 2020. The advent of the 11.0 Big Sur system has shown that the myth of the non-
flying of symbolic patches is untenable. We've been flying both in Clover and in OpenCore.
Autumn 2020. Once again Jief Machak took the job, for the connection of loaders Clover
and OpenCore. OpenCore is already loading BigSur because vit9696 has made loading cupcakes
directly into the cache, and the Clover method of injecting into the BigSur device tree with its new
safety requirements has been rejected. What's easier to understand this problem, or to take the
method from competitors? Gif decided to go the second way. Vitali's idea to takeClover's GI as a
set of libraries and attach to opencore is unfortunately unrealistic, Clover is already written on THE
CJ, and back on the C library it is no longer cut.
Now a combined loader, from two repositories,
https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/CloverBootloader
https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/OpenCorePkg
compiled as a whole, launched as Clover and looks like Clover with his GIUs and settings, and
when selecting a system to be downloaded, delegates authority to OpenCore and gives it control.
Tactical specifications
EFI - Extensible Firmware Interface is an expandable access interface for hardware-
dependent features. Unlike BIOS, which occupies 64kb and is written in 16-bit codes, EFI
occupies from 4MB, is written in 32 or 64-bit codes, and is positioned as ahardware-on-the-
independent though... Of course, miracles do not happen, and 100% compatibility with any
platform is impossible to achieve. The real UEFI BIOS is of course hardware-dependent.
20
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Clover is an EFI operating system loader for computers already with UEFI BIOS (Unified
EFI...), and for computers that do not have one. At the same time, the operating systems
themselves can support EFI-loading (OSX, Windows 7-64EFI, Linux), or not (Windows XP), in the
latter case provided a legacy-boot - a return to the old scheme of BIOS-loading through the boot
sectors.
EFI isn't just the initial loading phase of the OS, it also creates tables and services that are
available for use in the OS, and its performance depends on the correctness of this stage. CloverEFI
and CloverGUI do a lot of work to adjust the built-in tables to enable OSX to run:
-
The SMBIOS (DMI) table is filled with data that emulates real-world Apple Macintosh
computers - a condition for the launch of OSX. However, it is desirable that the user
substituted unique numbers. Why, for example, grub does not loadt Hacos?
-
ACPI tables contained in the computer's ROM tend to contain errors and flaws, most often
because of the laziness of the manufacturers: in the APIC table the wrong number of CPU
cores, the NMI data is missing from the FACP table, there is no Reset register, the wrong
power profile, the SSDT tables do not have data for EIST, and there is no data for DSDT at
all. That is, MAKOS has its own requirements for ATPI, which do not coincide with the
ATPI of conventional computers. Clover is trying to fix it all;
-
OSX also aims to get data from the downloader on additional devices such as graphics
card, network, sound, etc. through the Device Properties string mechanism. Clover
generates such information;
-
BIOS-based computers are characterized by the use of USB in the early stages of downloading in
Legasi mode, which becomes unacceptable when transferring control to the OS.
-
OSX also exchanges information with EFI through a special NVRAM memory, which is
accessed through RuntimeSevices, which are not available in the legas loaders. Clover
provides this two-way exchange, which gives Firewire the right job, the ability to
download Nwidia's Web Driver, the ability to use the "Boot Drive" control panel to
automatically reboot to another system. NVRAM is needed for the ability to register inthe
services xiCloud and iMessage, for hibernation, for the work of FileVault2, etc.;
-
You need a ConsoleControl protocol that's missing from The Blow, other similar
little things;
-
it is necessary to fill out some data in the EFI/Platform through the DataHub protocol,
absent from the Blowa, and not always present in UEFI. The most serious value of
FSBFrequency, the definition of which is the loader's task, the data in the DMI is inaccurate,
or not at all, and we use this protocol for sensors, and not all hacking officers use it,
and someone goes his own way, and wonders why it does not work;
-
before the CPU starts, it must be properly initiated, but since the system boards are made
universal, for a whole range of different CPU, the internal tables do not have data on the
processor, or there are some universal, incorrect in the hour-darkcase.
21
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
complete detection of the installed CPU and makes the necessary corrections in the tables,
and in the CPU itself. As one of the results - the Turbo mode is turned on;
-
BIOS somehow uses computer memory, breaks down into regions aboutthelimiting
destination, but often it is not done in the way it needs to run macOS; The
OsxAptioFixDrv driver and its descendants, which for a number of reasons are allocated from
Clover to a separate module, are involved in the adjustment of the memory card, and other
related details, so as not to interfere with the legoshi-loading;
-
Another little thing. The sources of DUET, and the entire EDK2 are written universal
under different irons. but the dependence on iron is made through constants. That is
It is assumed that the user compiles the Blow none specific configuration.
All of this is done automatically, and the newcomer can use Clover without even
understanding anything about the problems. Their consideration is the purpose of this book.
This is the wrong approach. Config will be corrected after you try to download something.
What's what?
In a nutshell, Clover has four main functions:
1. Intercepts control, so that not BIOS loaded the operating system, so that it is done through
Clover.
2. Modifying the data that BIOS transmits to the operating system is the basic
requirement for downloading MACOS.
3. Modis the MacOS system itself to work on this iron.
4. In some cases, Clover corrects the state of the devices, which theB.S.A. did not doat the
time.
Windows and Linux do not need paragraph 3, and the second is rare. But on the first point
clarifications are needed, as beginners start with the question "Why not ship." When you turn
on or reboot yourcomputer, the operating system is loaded with Clover on the next path.
OptionA. A computer based on BIOS (legasi-loading)
BIOS→MBR→PBR→boot→CLOVERX64.efi→OSloader (boot.efi in the case of
MacOSX, bootmgfw.efi for Windows, grub.efi for Linux).
Wonder? Words:
1. When the computer starts, he chooses which disk to start from if the legas load.
2. BIOS reads the zero sector from this diska. The codes are written into memory, and
BIOS transfers control to them.
3. The program embedded in MBR looks for a download section on this disk, reads from
there the first sector in memory, and transfers it to the code management.
4. The program embedded in PBR searches for a file with the name of the boot in its file
system, uploads it to memory, and transfers it to control.
5. CloverEFI searches for the CloverX64.efi file, downloads it, and hands it over
control.
22
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
OptionB. Computer based on UEFI BIOS (new circuit, UEFI-download)
UEFI_BIOS→CLOVERX64.efi→OSloader (or BootX64.efi)
1-5. If UEFI BIOS, it is able to find the starter EFI module in the EFI section. Efi. In some BIOS
the name EFI/microsoft/boot/bootmgfw.efi is sewn. Efi. This is the only thing you need to learn.
EFI is also replaced by Clover.
6. Finally we downloaded CLOVERX64. EFI, we see a selection of operating systems, and we
can download some of them.
For all this to happen, the following files must bepro-sled in the following places:
MBR Sector
zero block of external media from which the download occurs (HDD, SSD, USB Stick, USB
HDD, DVD). In this block should write down the first 440 bytes one of the options:
boot0af (Active First) is its role in finding an active section in the MBR disk marking, and
transferring control to its PBR sector. A hybrid MBR/GPT scheme is possible. If the markup is
pure GPT, i.e. there are no active sections, then there is a transfer of control to the EFI
section, which is recognizedbyTHE C12A7328-F81F-11D2-BA4B-00A0C93EC93B. If you
suddenly reformat this section, check what it now guid. boot0ss (Scan Signature) - search for the
first section with 0xAF signature, i.e. This way you can download the system from the HFS
section on the GPT marked disk, but only from the first such section. If such a section is not
found, the FAT32, or ExFAT sections, in this signature check order, continues to be searched and
transferred to it.
boot0ab - search for a section with a signature 0xAB - Apple Boot Partition. That is Recovery.
boot0md is a combination option that searches for a section on multiple drives, not just the main
one.
PBR Sector
the first blocks of each section on the chosen media. This downloader knows the file system of its
section, and is able to find a file with the name boot to download it and transfer control to it.
boot1h2 - for the HFS file system and support the length of the boot file up to 472kb. The old version
of boot1h distributed with the loader "Chameleon" supports only 440kb file (472). For those who
first installed Chameleon, once again remind: the PBR sector must be updated with a boot1h
file from the Clover kit, otherwise it will not start. The boot1h2 option has a pause of 2 seconds
to switch the loader.
boot1h - too, but without pause.
boot1f32alt - for the FILE system FAT32. This file system has recording support, so it is very
convenient to install a downloader on it.
2: for historical reasons recommend to reformat every flash drive, and even necessarily in the Windows system.
This recommendation is now out of date and has no basis.
23
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
boot1f32 is a non-pause option.
Attention! FileI system should be exactly FAT32, not MSDOS, for FAT16 is unacceptable.
boot1x - zenith432 has made a boot-sector that is designed for the exFAT file system.
Unfortunately, the driver inside Clover is only ReadOnly, however, this file system is very
interesting for external media, because it supports files more than 4GB, and is supported by
recording by both Mac and Windowes.
These sectors (to say the phase 2 loaders) have another useful function. They have an initial delay
at a start of two seconds while waiting for input from the keyboard. The entered figure will be
attached to the file name, i.e. by clicking key 1 on the black Ekranot at the beginning of the
download (after the MESSAGE of BIOS "booting from...") we will download the boot1 file by
clicking the 3rd you will download the boot3 file by pressing the 6th button we will download the
boot6 file. The point is to keep different downloader options in one place, or even
differentdownloaders, just by giving them different numbers.
boot - Clover, current version, or test version of boot1 -
Chameleon
boot3 - Clover-32bit, proven, working version (displays the number 3) boot4 - Clover-
32bit, with BiosBlockIO driver
boot5 - Clover-64bit, shortened size, so as not to overlap EBDA (see below) boot6 -
Clover-64bit, proven, working version (displays the number 6)
boot7 is a Clover-64bit with a BiosBlockIO driver that works with any controllers that are
supported by BIOS. (displays the letter B or L or 7)
In addition to these options, the PBR sector may include a Windows boot manager who knows the
NTFS file system; Grub, who knows the EXT4 file system; and others unrelated to Clover.
Boot or CloverEFI
In the case of Chameleon, the "boot" file is the entire loader. In Clover's case, this file has
the entire EFI system, as well as a supportservice to transfer control to the next stage.
It really turns out that there is not all, and some details (so-called driver) should be downloaded
additionally. Details already collected in the A-variant A boot file.
Unlike previous stages, the boot file is already different in bitness, i.e. individual variants for 32 and
64 bit downloads. In most cases, you should choose 64bit option, if the processor supports this set
of instructions (inmania! Pentium 4 and Yonah
only 32 bits).
However, if for some reason it is supposed to work only in a 32-bit OS, it makes sense to ship
EFI32. It is 20% smaller and faster. Unfortunately, it is incompatible with Windows 7 EFI, which is
always 64bit. November 2016: Goodbye, Clover-32!
At its core, the boot file is a modified DUET. And fixes are essentially unlikely to get 1%,
but this percentage is astark difference from Blowing - Clover is working for the purpose for which
he's meant. This is far from the case, but I have no purpose to describe all the intricaciesof this
development.However, the functionality of CloverEFI hasn't changed for a very long time, so if you
have a problem with the new
24
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
version, put the version that worked for you. So in the compl,which was officially distributed on
the SF.NET included an old file boot7-MCP79, because for some reason the new boot7 stopped
working with this chipset.
It's another minor problem. PBR is looking for a boot file. But the Windows installer has a
folder with that name, there's a single boot in boot5, and I've been using an alternative download.
CLOVERIA32.efi and CLOVERX64.efi or CloverGUI
This file, in two variations of varying bits, is a loader's graphic shell for selecting an
operating system, To install additional options, to load additional drivers and to start theOS.
Graphics and menus are originally based on the rEFIt
3
project, which is reflected inthe directory
name and in the Aboutmenu.
In the future, we call this cloverGUI program in general.

That is, the CLOVERX64.efi file should be at /EFI/CLOVER/, and the font
BoG_LucidaConsole_10W_NA.png in thefolder /EFI/CLOVER/themes/black_green/.
A few words about the folder /EFI/CLOVER/OEM/
The folder is designed to store download options for different configurations. Typical situation
when we create a boot drive, and on it in addition to the general confit
/EFI/CLOVER/config.plist, there are also well-calibrated /EFI/CLOVER/OEM/Inspiron 1525/
config.plist and /EFI/CLOVER/OEM/H61M-S1/UEFI/config.plist, as well as their developed
DSDT.aml, different for different computers, and different sets of cupcakes.
The name of the folder is determined from SMBIOS and you canlook at the boot.log exactly what your
computer is called:
0:100 0:000 Running on: 'Z170X-UD5 TH' with board 'Z170X-UD5 TH-CF'
In the first line the name of the entire system is characteristic of the presence of laptops, but on
desktops there is something abstract. In the second line, the motherboard model is convenient for
desktops, but not for laptops.
26
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Even in your folder may contain a UEFI folder to have different confits for UEFI (option B) and
for a legague download (option A) on one computer (although I personally doubt that someone
needs it).
EFI Driver
Separately, I'll mention the drivers32, drivers64, drivers64UEFI, respectively, for 32, for
64bit downloads under option A - BIOS boot, and for UEFI downloads under option B. The
composition of these folders will be different for different bios audits, as well as for different
configurationsof sections. Attention! the structure of the folders in the 5000 audit has changed,
now it's one folder, with the embedded folders BIOS and UEFI. 32Bit is gone forever.
It is worth noting that these drivers have power only for the duration of the loader. They do
not affect the downloaded operating system, except indirectly, by the way the devices will be
initiated (the fourth function of Clover).
What should you put in these folders?
-
NTFS.efi is the driver of the NTFS file system, for the ability to ship Windows EFI,
however... it seems and is not needed especially, because the EFI-loader Vindous also lies
in ESP, on FAT32.
-
HFSPlus.efi is the driver of the HFS file system, which is required to launch MacOSX. It's
necessary for option B, but in A it's already present in the boot file.
-
VboxHFS.efi is a legel alternative for HFSPlus.efi, is slightly less fast. Whereas
HFSPlus.efi is just hard-line. That is, if the boot file has a built-in VboxHFS.efi, and in the
folder drivers/BIOS / has HFSPlus.efi then the last one will work.
-
VBoxExt2.efi is the driver of the EXT2/3 file system needed to launch Linux EFI. similar
to VboxExt4.efi. Again, if Grub does not lie in the EFI section.
-
Fat.efi is the driver of the FAT32 file system. Of course, he's already there. However,
the AMI UEFI BIOS contains a very curved driver, so I preferred to ship my option.
-
FSInject.efi is a driver intercepting the file system, in order to be able to force the
injection of some cupcakes into the system, if it does not consider it necessary.
Difficult to understand?
-
PartitionDxe.efi - actually, there is such a driver in CloverEFI, and in UEFI it is, but only
it is not designed for Apple partition, nor on the hybrid MBR/GPT. Conclusion: in option
B, you sometimes need a driver.
-
OsxFatBinaryDrv.efi is a necessary driver for option B, ensures the launch of fat (Fat)
modules, as is boot.efi in systems up to 10.9. In newer systems you can do without it.
-
OsxAptioFixDrv.efi is a special driver designed to correct the memory card created by
the AMI AptioEFI curve, otherwise OS cannot be launched.
-
OsxAptioFix2Drv.efi is a slightly modified version. With it was possible Hibernite in
the system 10.9.1 at UEFI-loading! But, unfortunately, this variationdoes not ship
10.7.5.
-
OsxAptioFix3Drv.efi - a new version, adjusted vit9696 to support the native
NVRAM, can now do without its emulation!
27
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
-
AptioMemoryFix.efi is a completely redesigned driver from this series, authored by
vit9696, with an additional automatic search for the best slide'xxx value. At the
moment it is recommended to use it first
-
OsxLowMemFix.efi is a simplified version of AptioFix, suitable for some strange
variants of UEFI BIOS (Insyde H2O).
-
These five Aptio variants will not be used at the same time, even if all are present, Clover is
choosing one of them on priority: AptioMemoryFix, OsxAptioFix3Drv.efi,
OsxAptioFix2Drv.efi, OsxAptioFixDrv.efi and, last of all OsxLowMemFix.efi.
-
For the new audit of Clover 5120, it is recommended that all of these drivers be
forgotten, and to use the amount of Oc'uyrksandOpenRuntime, which are now
included in the Clover package, and starting with 5122 Oc'uyrks is no longer
needed, it is contained inside Clover;
-
NvmExpressDxe, the NvmExpress controller driver positioned as a replacement for
SATA for SSD drives, should be borne in mind that if the controller is on the motherboard,
then such a driver is likely already available in UEFI BiOS.
-
Usb'.efi, UHCI.efi, EHCI.efi, XHCI.efi, OHCI.efi - a set of USB drivers, for those cases
of option B, when built-in drivers for some reason do not work well. Why would I?
There may be some kind of tie-up for other features that have had to be turned off.
-
PS2Mouse..., PS2MouseAbsolute..., UsbMouse... - a set of drivers to support the
mouse/trackpad/touchpad in the CloverGUI interface. In UEFI BIOS there is also such a
driver, do not interfere with it.
-
AptioInputFix is also for mouse and keyboard, if the UEFI bios version works cryduring.
Written by vit9696.
-
DataHubDxe.efi - this driver is already present in option A, and it is possible to have it
in UEFI. There will be no conflict, but there will be confidence thatit is there. And they don't
have DataHubDxe! Then they don't come to me.
-
CsmVideoDxe.efi is a video driver that provides a larger screen size range than the
UEFI built-in option if the graphics card doesn't have UEFI VideoBIOS.
-
GrubNTFS, GrubEXFAT, GrubHFSPLUS, GrubUDF... - a set of drivers of a variety of
file systems adapted from the sources of grub to work as part of Clover. They have some
advantages over our drivers, for example GrubHFS supports compressed volumes, but the
status of all this set is more likely "beta." They are slow and buggy. HFS - no link
support, UDF - not all hiders reads, EXFAT - no record (and so would like!).
-
AppleImageCodec.efi is a PNG decoder and BMP file, needed for FileVault2.
-
AppleKeyAggregator.efi creates a special protocol for entering a password in the
FileVault2 interface.
-
AppleUITheme.efi creates a protocol by which FileVault2 draws a background
image of the screen (in Sierra, to theimer, it is a blurred mountain).
28
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
-
AppleKeyFeeder.efi is required to enter a password in the FileVault2 interface
with a PS2 keyboard.
-
FirmwareVolume.efi creates the FirmwareVolume protocol, which is not used
anywhere but FileVault2, which expects to find a cursor image there.
-
SMCHelper.efi creates an AppleSMCProtocol protocol that would interact with the SMC
chip and get information about the state of the periphery from there. The content is filled by
both Clover and FakeSMC, which retains the keys to NVRAM if FakeSMC
stands with such a feature.
-
HashServiceFix.efi creates HashService group protocols if UEFI doesn't have them.
FileVault2 interacts with them, as can be seen from the logs. But I didn't see any
visual effect.
-
APFS.efi is the driver of the new file system, which appeared at 10.13am. This driver
does not yet have an open analogue, so we use what is in the installed system from Apple on
the way /usr/standalone/i386/apfs.efi, or →
-
ApfsDriverLoader is an open alternative to the APFS driver. Thank you savvas and other
members of the acidantheragroup. Its essence is to load the desired APFS driver simply from
the container, so always having the right version. However, if we download the old system,
we get an old driver, and can't read the APFS section with the new system.
-
AudioDxe is a sound driver developed by Goldfish64. It can be used to play the sound when
you start your computer. However, this decoration, if such a sound is not needed, and
without a driver can be burnedand.
Download cupcakes
In the folder structure, we see a shared folder /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/ with folders 10.7/, 10.11/
and so on, as well as folders with the name Off/ and Others/. Let's take a closer look at the issue.
Cupcakes are "Kernel Extensions" for the MacOSX operating system, most of them are drivers of
some devices. Or a pseudo-daver of a non-existent device like FakeSMC. We download them
becauseApple's clean sis theme just doesn't support our devices, or we want to introduce new
functionality.
Starting with Audit 3281, all cupcakes are first downloaded from the Others/folder and then
from a folder with a specific operating system number. AppleHDA, for example, in each system its
own (I do not know, the truth, whether it is loaded with Clover). To me, so the meaning of only
FakeSMC, the rest may be in the system itself, and even then, only at the time of installation,
because in the installer all the cupcakes are packed in cache, and there is impossible to slip
something of your own (although... OpenCore seems to be able to do that). But since people want to
ship all the cupcakes To Clover, let it be such an opportunity. Options:
29
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
First, if you're manually prescribing the menu (Custom → Entries), you can describe
InjectKexts'Yes/No/Detectfor eachitem.
Secondly, there is a common setting for all
<key>SystemParameters</key>
<dict>
<key>InjectKexts</key>
<string>YES</string>
Detect is out of date and no longer used, and we always want to inject cupcakes.
Another moment. In the Captain there is an additional check on unsigned cupcakes to
overcome it must be turned off SIP (System Integrity Protection), it is done in the confit in the
key CsrActiveConfig
<key>RtVariables</key>
<dict>
<key>CsrActiveConfig</key>
<string>0x3F7</string>
Plays the role of only a bit 0x1 (ALLOW_UNSIGNED_KEXTS) if you have unsigned cupcakes.
I've gotall the cupcakes signed, and I can load it with zero.
Starting with the 4233 audit, Clover's menu was able to block the download of
individual cupcakes from folders /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/z. So you can put a new, dubious
cupcake in there and try toload it up. And starting with the 5052 audit, you can put a dubious
cupcake in the folder /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/Off/, for example VoodooPS2 from Vasya Pupkin,
who promises that his cupcake is better, the better you have. When you download in Clover's
menu, click on the Space, and you see the menu to ban the cupcake inject.
Development
The project has no commercial significance for licensing reasons, and is also very large in
scope to do it alone, so the most reasonable decision sf.net to make it with open sources
4,
and let
everyone contribute.
http://cloverefiboot.sourceforge.net/
With the 2.5k version, we moved to a new repository at
https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/CloverBootloader
there are also compiled versions, ready to use
https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/CloverBootloader/releases
Lyrical retreat. In the creation of the project, and even so much, requires work on the
following points:
- Collecting documentation, dates, specifications, samples of programs for the task, and
informationabouthacker finds. I had a good starting point - Chameleon, in which
"everything" works (in quotes, however!). However, time is running out, and new
processors, new graphics cards, new requirements for new versions of OSX are added, and
you need to look again at descriptions, or do new tests. The starting point was
systematized by Kabyl, a nod, first of all, to him.
4 Open source projects, however, have some limitations in use, so to speak "licensing." The GPL license is out,
Intel does not recommend using it. Clover goes like a BSD.
30
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
–
When there is a task setting, input data and what is desirable to get on the way out, it is
necessary to writean algorithm, preferably compact and fast, preferably unmistakable
and safe.
–
It's time for tedious and hard, but simple (?) work on writing thousands of lines of
code, where especially think and do not need, copy-paste with corrections. Your project
is yours and work hard. Such a rhetorical question: if I have adapted other people's
sources to my project, how big my contribution is?
–
Then there is the work on testing and identifying errors. I have a lot of helpers here, I
can't even applelife.ru remember everyone. All this is useful, even nagging, because it
makes you think how to make it not there (whether the problem is solved or not, the
whining must stop!).
–
The worst kind of error is a fundamental problem. The first three problems I solved alone
for more than six months: 1. KP in junior systems, 2. Lack of sleep, 3. No start on the
laptop. The following problems were solved together with Dmazar and Pena: 4. iCloud, 5.
iMessage. I do not see those who want to work, although there are those who want to see
the result. 2018: You can forget about legasi-but, you don't need it.
–
It's also worth mentioning additional things: compilation scripts, installer, system scripts
and applications that are directly related tothe project, although not part of the downloader.
Now it is in the competence of vector-sigma.
–
Jief Machak did a lot of work on translation to CJ, and on association with
OpenCore.
–
And the program should be documented. Again, painstaking and not too interesting
work. Here a special thank you xsmile for translating this book into English, and in this
form it came to WIKI, where different people from time to time make their own inlad.
A separate word about Dmazar. It's not just a contributor, it's a second author. Clover in its
current form is not my author's work, without the dmazar it would be only a legoshi-loader. Dazar
did the UEFI download. He owns the following technologies:
• OsxAptioFixDrv with all options, otherwise UEFI does not ship macOS. I note that the
work of this driver is still incomprehensible to any programmer, only the author understood
it;came vit9696, figured it out, and made a new version of AptioMemoryFix, with the
support of NVRAM.
• DmpUefiCalls, without which we would not have been able to find out what MacOs need;
• EmuVariableUefi - for those who do not have an iron NVRAM, and such was the
majority. Without this driver on some configurations and download impossible.
• and working with NVRAM inside Clover;
• The initial sources from the pcj, who planted them and ran away, and Dmazar brought to
mind without even havingmelted his copywriting;
31
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
• FSInject needed for a cupcake patch. Again, no one knows how it works anymore;
• OsxFatBinaryDxe, needed for systems up to 10.8, because in those boot.efi systems was
FatBinary, which UEFI does not understand;
• Hibernet. We worked together, but it was Dmaar who pointed out how this could be
achieved;
• and in general helped me correct semantic errors in my codes. That's right, one in the
field is not a warrior.
Other developers and contributors are mentioned in one way or another in the ishaand in the
installer.
I write this chapter in the expectation that there will still be those who want to work on the
project, and for this you need to learn at least to compile.
Details
In order to compile the project, you still need a compiler, and libraries - an alphabetical truth.
Framework? Environment? In Russian, I guess I have to say LAST. It is downloaded from the same
server. http://sourceforge.net/projects/edk2/
Since the entire project was created for Hakintosh and for Hakintosh' sake, the compilation
of the project in the MacOSX environment is primarily considered. This, however, is not the only
option Ihave. The built-in MacOSX tools are still not sufficient to compile the project, so it is
suggested, as for Linux, to download and assemble a new version of gcc using the script builgcc.sh
in Clover's folder. Because Klang still doesn't give out workable codes.Thanks to zenith432, he
finally made a workable compilation with Klan, so this text is being modified.
Starting with the modern version of 2.5k and in this there was a drastic change, the previous
paragraph should be considered obsolete. All the necessary libraries of the environment are now
included in Clover's composition, and its repository is complete for compilation, no external references
are needed anymore.
Writing codes
If there are those who wish, you can join the team of programmers, and offer your piece. We
always go to meet, although we make certain requirements for codes. Initially, the project was made
in the language C, formatted under the special rules of Tiano Code Style.
https://github.com/tianocore/tianocore.github.io/wiki/Code-Style-C
However, with the transition to CJ, we do not want to use such a numberof macros, and we should
consider using a standard programming style.
32
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
set of sources to build your project. But we're doing a real project, and we're setting our
own rules, under powerful compilers and modern iron.
About CJ.
1. By assembling structures and functions into logically unified classes, we simplify the code,
and make it more visual. Code Reusing.
2. You don't need to declare variables in advance, as the C. Variable language required, where
it is used. Inthe measures, it's a cycle for (int i'0; i'lt;0; zom).
3. Nightmares with Allocate/Free can be eliminated by using the automatic memory
control compiler capabilities.
4. To refuse to use arrays in favor of vectors.
5. Refusing to copy pointers is the biggest source of bugs in the project. Although it allows you
to save something. Use links or copy structures entirely.
6. Avoid retyping. Writing (INTN)N means logical error. If the N variable is used in an iconic
expression, that is, which can become less than zero, why has it been declared unsigned? And
similar to the types of pointers. CJ does not encourage this type spoofing, and we require that type
swapping be used as rarely as possible.
7. More use constant variables and functions, that is, indicate to the compiler that their
valuewillnot be allowed, the compiler then and the code accordingly another will apply. And
for a programmer breaking the ban there will be a warning.
8. We don't have a STL library, but we create our own classes, andwe're all sources for their use.
9. Tiano Code Style implies the use of CONST, VOID, STATIC written in capital letters.
Why??? to make the language look more like a fortran, or what?! We tend to more standard
writing const, void, static,and so on.
Compilation
Now to the point. The reader who looked into this chapter can not by definition be a
simple user, and he does not need to tell how to use the terminal.
1. We download the
sources. cd ~
mkdir src
git clone --recurse-submodule https://github.com/CloverHackyColor/CloverBootloader.git
cd CloverBootloader
2. We're collecting compilation tools
./buildgettext.sh
33
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
./build_gcc10.sh
./buildnasm.sh
However, you can not collect NASM yourself, but simply download the latest release from the
official site of the http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/, at the momentversion 2.15.05, and
put in the folder of z/src/opt/local/bin/
If you forget any of this, then Clover's compilation script will do it for you.
3. Collecting Clover is either partially or completely scripted
./buildme
asks you exactly what you want. Vector-sigma made a menu there with a choice from test build
to full release.
Obsolete!
1. We download the sources and prepare the environment:
cd ~ mkdir
src cd src
git clone https://github.com/tianocore/edk2 -b UDK2018 --depth 1 UDK2018 cd UDK2018
svn co svn://svn.code.sf.net/p/cloverefiboot/code/ Clover make -C BaseTools/Source/C
cd Clover
Or use a traditional EDK2. It continues to evolve its way, while Clover uses those functions that
have long been made and adjusted, so it is enough to use UDK2018, but if you want, it is possible,
with a specific revision, or with the latter, if it is known that it is working with Clover:
svn co -r 18198 https://svn.code.sf.net/p/edk2/code/trunk/edk2 edk2 svn co
https://svn.code.sf.net/p/edk2/code/trunk/edk2 edk2
2. We assemble compilationtools
./buildgettext.sh
./buildgcc-4.9.sh
./buildnasm.sh
Now gcc is not particularly needed, Clover is perfectly compiled by the built-in clang, and Xcode
you have to be installed anyway, so the compilation key -t XCODE8 is now the default key.
NASM needs version 2.13.03 at least, better than the newest, in the system it seems to already
exist, but the old version, so it should either be collected by the aforementioned script, or just
download the finished release here: http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/
The correct version should be here
q/src/opt/local/bin/nasm or simple
/opt/local/bin/mkdir-p/opt/local/bin/
sudo cp ~/Downloads/nasm-2.13.03/nasm /opt/local/bin
Even to compile the clan needs a utility MTOC, it can be assembled by the most of the latest
sources,
./buildmtoc.sh
or simply take a finished file that comes with Clover's source in the
Clover/BuildTools/usr/local/bin/mtoc folder. NEW.zip
unpack, and put in /usr/local/bin/mtoc. NEW
34
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Now it doesn't come in if you still don't have it, collect a version of the script, or borrow
the finished version on the Internet. It doesn't need to be updated.
3. We correct the EDK2 environment to our needs by choosing appropriate patches
Cd..
./edksetup.sh cd
Clover
./buildgettext.sh
cp -R /Patches_for_UDK2018/* .. /
4. Now you can collect CloverEFI itself.
./ebuild.sh
./ebuild.sh -mc --no-usb
./ebuild.sh -ia32
The default is now -x64 and --xcode8, if there is a desire to compile with gcc, then
./ebuild.sh -gcc49
or even -gcc53, or -t XCODE5
Other compilation scripts, usually self-documented, have also been created. Look, choose, use.
5. One subtlety. The repository does not have HFSPlus.efi files for 32 and 64 bits, due to their
privacy. This driver is workable, but a little slower.
Was
# foreign file system support #INF
Clover/VBoxFsDxe/VBoxHfs.inf
INF RuleOverride=BINARY Clover/HFSPlus/HFSPlus.inf
Do (now so done insilence)
# foreign file system support INF
Clover/VBoxFsDxe/VBoxHfs.inf
#INF RuleOverride=BINARY Clover/HFSPlus/HFSPlus.inf
6. Similarly, there is no apfs.efi, but there is no analogue, you need to take from the system
10.13 from the folder usr/stanadlone/i386/apfs.efi, or use ApfsDriverLoader.efi
7. The project does not stand still, so this instruction may eventually be inoperable due to some
small change.
8. Now we're assembling an installer.
cd ~/src/edk2/Clover/CloverPackage/
./makepkg
./makeiso
It's done! Some steps could be lowered if you do for yourself and not for the first time. For
example, instead of downloading the entire project, do simply an update svn up or better ./update.sh
(including an EDK2 update, but not needed for UDK2018), eliminate a 32-bit compilation, and not
collect a package and an image of the disk.
Full-automated CloverGrower scripts and its Pro version are prepared for teapots. The script to
help the kettle itself compile the package. The kettle is better to download the finished installer.
Nb! A new LinkTimeOptimization compilation method has been introduced in the 3000 audits,
significantly reducing the size of the code. Compiler gcc-4.8 without it, 4.9 with it.
Size without it 675520, with optimization 633536, and works the same way, only faster.
35
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
You don't have to do that for a klang.
Since the audit, 3059 has been able to reduce the size and file boot (CloverEFI) by shifting the
Translation Page Table from 0x90,000 to 0x88000, The file size was483KB, became 450KB, and
in doing so it was more secure to work on some chip sets.
Compilation withcconfe
./ebuild.sh --low-ebda
Now this key is the default to undo, you need a key -std-ebda.
It is also interesting for developers to know where the letter "B" or "6" is formed, which is
displayed on the screen at the start of CloverEFI. The 6x3 editing editor is looking for a 0x02a9
offset, there and seeing a byte of 0x42 or 0x36 respectively. By the way, undo this letter is nota use,
because it is a trick to Clover at all to start. BIOS produces the initialization of the video adapter at
this point.
Making a DEBUG version of Clover
When people complain that Clover isn't running, and sothey can't pre-report, I can't help but
a couple of standard tips.
Option 1. .
1. The start-up sector st32_64.s. It is the output of this very number 6, the removalof theBIOS
memory card, switching the A20, and switching the processor from 16 bits to 32 and 64. My
version of the sector differs from the vanilla theme that works on a laptop. It is possible that for
someone and here there will be problems.
2. Start codes S. File efi32.s or efi64.s. Here hardly anything can slow down.
3. File Efiloader.c. Here you can insert output onto the screen using the
PrintHeader('A') procedure; which is currently commented on.
4. File DxeIpl/DxeInit.c. You can also insert PrintHeader, but also include Debug.c in the
compilation of this module.
5. DxeCore. Here the execution is already sprawling, and to track where and what is more
difficult. You can do the same.
6. CLOVERX64 itself. EFI is downloaded in the BdsBoot.c/BdsLibBootViaBootOption
().
Option 2. The blow itself works that you can check by clicking the space wedazu after output 6 on
the screen.
The standard method of Boot---debug'true is not satisfied, because you need to trace the place in more
detail.
In thisincident, we take a comment in the 11th line in the Platform.h file
#define DEBUG_ALL 2
or put DEBUG_xxx 2 in the files of interest in the top lines. At the same time, the entire withdrawal
from the DBG team ("Nightmare No.3)); will go to the screen. And in this way, you can
interactively observeto what place the program will be performed before it hangs.
36
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
It's a good place to be. Don't use Russian letters, as I illustrated here! With the transition to CJ,
Russian letters can be used in debage
Option 3. Compileethe debage version with stop points, run under the control of zEMU with a
special gdb installed.
Option4. When compilinga ./ebuild.sh -D DEBUG_ON_SERIAL_PORT
and connect another computer to the serial port that can take letters to a serial port (terminal in
winds). The option works on zEMU if you start to specify the "-serial stdio" flag
Installation
Usingan installer
What is the installer for? Why do it manually, the installer will do everything more
accurately than you do! The only condition that you already have MacOSX on this
computer. The installation DVD was launched with another downloader, and the installation
interface of MacOSX was launched.
So
We follow the Keys Continue and OK, read and agree with the license agreements (hmm, and they are
there?), and come to choose what we set, where and why.
37
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Change Install Location - the choice of where to put the loader. MacHDD in this sample. And tick
on "Install Clover in the ESP."
Customize or Standard Install - a choice of download options
Ifyou put a cursor on one of the lines, there will be a brief description of this option in the
bottom field.
Install Clover only for UEFI downloads - this option cancels the installation of bootfiles.
38
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
People, for God's sake, don't tick this box, even if you havea computer with UEFI BIOS.
Install Clover in the ESP (Install Clover on EFI SECTION ESP) is the best
option when there is such a section (GPT section scheme).
"automatic update program").
Before installation should be dismantled section ESP.
sudo mount -uw /
that will allow scripts to write files into system folders.
If the system writes that the installer cannot be opened because its author is an unidentified developer,
you can go to the system settings, Security, and press the "Still Open" button. Or you can command in
the terminal
sudo spctl --master-disable
However, it is not my business to teach you the tricks of using macos.
Bootloader is a variant with BIOS (option A) that uses CloverEFI, or with UEFI (option
B).
-
Don't update MBR and PBR sectors - don't update sectors because they already exist,
or just for option B;
-
Install boot0af in MBR - boot0af download, i.e. Search for an active section. The installer
will make the selected section active. The exception is the installation on the EFI section, it
is not made active, and boot0af without finding an active section will ship the boot file from
the EFI section, what we need to make a boot from the GPT disk, from the ESP section.
-
Install boot0ss in MBR - boot0ss download, i.e. Search for the HFS section, even if it's
inactive.
Use Alternative Booting PBR (Use PBR withdownload load) - as stated in the chapter "What is
what", the PBR sector can be with a pause of 2 seconds to press 1-9, or without it. This item is no
longer in the installer ;)
CloverEFI is, as can be seen from the downloader's list,thechoice of loader bits. And, as a rule,
works with any controller (BIOS should work with them!).
Drivers. . . the choice of drivers is explained above in the chapter "What is what."
Install system scripts RC on the main section - These are scripts rc.local and rc.shutdown.local,
which are executed by the OSX system at the entrance and exit - a necessary part of the entire
legosy-Clover concept.
Install scripts on all other sections - if the computer has more than one section with MacOSX.
39
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Install the Clover control panel - this control panel helps Clover update, select the theme, and
install NVRAM variables.
Installing the loader manually
It is necessary in twocases: when catching fleas and in diarrhea. First, when a person knows
well what he is doing, and wants to control every step, not believing the installer (and in vain!), and,
secondly, when installed from under another OS, where the installer is not possible to start.
Osx
It is not recommended to do this to someone who does not know what the terminal is.
Installing on the HFS section in MBR or hybrid breakdown. WhyMBR? Is it a very standard
situation where the computer already exists, and already with the information, nothing to lose, you
can only put a new loader.
Installation of the MBR sector
cd BootSectors
sudo fdisk440 -f boot0 -u -y /dev/rdisk0
What's on this team?
fdisk440 is a special version of the fdisk utility, adjusted to use only 440 bytes of the zero sector,
there is information that it is necessary for compatibility with Windows (wake-up problem), which
Apple did not take care of.
boot0 - file described above in the chapter "What is what"
rdisk0 is a physical device, andyou're going to put a loader on it.
These files come with Clover. The new version of fdisk440 is excluded, primarily because of the
inability to compile it in the new environment. Now we use dd instead, as shown for Linux.
Installation of the PBR sector
sudo dd if=boot1h2 of=/dev/rdisk0s9
40
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
boot1h2 is a PBR sector file for the HFS file system, differs from similar support for large boot files,
and the ability to select boot1.3.6 on the hot key. Details in the chapter "What is what."
rdisk0s9 is the ninth section on your chosen device... Why the nines? And you need to put a
real figure, for example, the first section.
And after the MBR and PBR sectors are successfully recorded on the selected
device/selected section, this section should be made active fdisk440 -e /dev/rdisk0
>f 9
>w
>q
Nine in the second line is again the section number (there are only four!) - make aconclusion.
Installation on the FAT32 section.
Unlike the previous method, there is one subtlety. The PBR sector should contain the geometry of
the section. This information is entered there in the process ofp-binging into sections, so the loss
of such information is fraught with consequences.
dd if=/dev/rdisk1s9 count=1 bs=512 of=origbs cp boot1f32alt newbs
dd if=origbs of=newbs skip=3 seek=3 bs=1 count=87 conv=notrunc dd if=newbs
of=/dev/rdisk1s9 count=1 bs=512
boot1f32alt - already mentioned in the chapter "What is what" - the sector to install on the section
FAT32. But not FAT16! Be careful!
rdisk1s9 - again the ninth section on the first device.
The rest of the action is similar to that of the HFS.
For owners of hard drives with a sector size of 4k.
In the first and fourth command, instead of bs'512, you have to write bs'4096.
It's a good place to be. However... that's not a fact! I've got a 4k drive with a perfect setup with 512.
Installation on exFAT section
Starting with the audit of 3040, it was possible to install Clover on the fold ofexFAT format.
./boot1-install -u -y /dev/disk2s1
In principle, the company has made both HFS and FAT32 installed by this utility. It is important
that the relevant sectors (boot1h, boot1f32, boot1x) lie in the same folder. For EXFAT, the sector
is called boot1x. Option with pawboot1xalt.
There is, however, another point when installing these sectors. Tom, where you want to install the
sector, you need to pre-install! And this is only possible if the disk is not systemic.
Linux
There is also a terminal under the Linux, and almost the same commands, but installation is only
possible on FAT32. The differences are as follows.
41
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
-
instead of rdisk1 will be sdb - look in your version of Linux more precisely.
-
instead of fdisk440 to record MBR, you need to use The Same Dd
Windows
From under Windows it also makes sense to put the loader only on the flash drive FAT32, it
is enough to run the script
makeusb.bat E:
where E: is the letter of your flash drive. It's Not supposed to be a few sections.
All the files required for the script are attached complete with Clover. However, the installer must
be pre-unpacked or receive these files directly from svn. They are in the folder
edk2/Clover/CloverPackage/CloverV2/BootSectors
After running the script, the flash drive needs to be removed and re-pasted, then copy the boot file
and the EFI folder to it.
It's even better to use BootDiskUtility.exe by Cvad to help you build a Flash drive from under
Windows.
http://www.applelife.ru/threads/delaem-zagruzochnuju-clover-fleshku-s-macosx-iz-windows.37189/
Recommended installation options
Such options I would personally recommend for installation:
1. The main Winchester is broken into the GPT (GUID Partition Table). This is a modern
scheme, most correct for Mac OS, and supported by Windows from 7.
For a UEFI download, you simply need to copy (or install) an EFI folder with all the necessary
content. But for BIOS to see this download option, you need to copythe file
/EFI/CLOVER/CLOVERX64. EFI in file
/EFI/BOOT/BOOTX64. EFI, if not. EFI.
To download the boot0af, you must write down the boot0af file to theMBR sector of this disk, and
write down the boot1f32 file (or boot1f32alt with a pause) in the PBR sector of this section.
Never put any section active!
On the night, Dell is worth the American Megatrend EFI, and it does not allow you to do a
legasi-boot on the GPT disk. Alas!for the rest of the opportunity is, and in the installer we do so:
(the screenshot is out of date, but the meaning remained)
dd if=/dev/sdb count=1 bs=512 of=origMBR cp origMBR
newMBR
dd if=boot0 of=newMBR bs=1 count=440 conv=notrunc dd if=newMBR
of=/dev/sdb count=1 bs=512
42
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
2. Winchester is already broken up as an FD PartitionISK Scheme, commonly referred to as an
ICBM. An old scheme that has always been used for Windows XP. On this disk, we have identified
a section where we want to install OSX for the test.
To do this, we write the boot0ss file into the MBR sector. This sector will look for the HFS
section we have for Mack and give it control. In the PBR sector of this section, you need to write
down a boot1h file from Clover's Compl. Once again I remind you that if you used the
Chameleon before, the same file from the Chameleon kit is written there, and it will not work with
Clover.
In the installer, the following ticks
43
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
3. You decided to allocate a separate hard drive for Mack. There is an option simply BIOS choose
what to ship, and the drive is prepared according to the first scenario. Its property is that it will look
for a HFS section on all hard drives, in which case it will work as a second option.
Now look again at the chapter about manual installation.
And finally. Isn't it time to completely abandon Windows XP, and put a Windowes UEFI, for
example seven? ICBMs drive canbe converted into aGPT utility gdisk. MacOS will only benefit
from this, and Windowes somehow once every six months reins. If anyone misunderstood,
Then Windows UEFI is perfectly put by Clover on a machine that does not have UEFY BIOS.
Design
Choosing a theme
Now we choose the theme. What is the theme? These are the elements of design: banner,
background image, drawings of icons and buttons, font, united by a single artistic idea.
In the installer there are three themes, my cesium, the theme from Clovy, it's vector themes, and
stretching from Blackosx, it somehow did not offer its SVG theme in the installer. Other than them
there are "Easter eggs" who saw, he knows, for the rest will be a surprise. And then there's Clover.
built-in theme from Clovy, called embedded. If you do not put any theme, then this will still be
available. And there is an application that online downloads you any theme from 40 available on the
gita. I will not tell you more, everything is transparent there.
http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/302674-clover-theme-manager/
44
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
In the modern version, you can specify the theme "random" and each next download to observe the
differentdesign.
Let's give a quick overview of the topics. Realistically the set of topics is much wider, look at the
forums, who offers what.
http://www.applelife.ru/threads/themes-temy-dlja-zagruzchika-clover.36074/
http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/288685-clover-themes/
http://clover-wiki.zetam.org/Theme-database
https://sourceforge.net/p/cloverefiboot/themes/
Now vector-sigma has made its Manager Tem Clover inside the Clover app.app Button looks
like a movie.
Choosing a theme
45
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Clover Loader Themes
Metal. .
Black-green.
46
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
steampunk. author medik.
And dozens more... Creating your own theme is a special story with its own rules.
Set up the interface at config.plist
Topics include a number of options in the config.plist file. For older versions, see old
versions of the instructions.
Interface settings are made in EFI/CLOVER/config.plist in GUI
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
The interface can be graphic, and it canbe textual (starting with the audit 1764).
<key>TextOnly</key>
<true/>
Probably, only in Russia live fans of text interface, Total Commander, Volkov
Commander, DOS, etc., etc.
Moscow, 2021
If it's false, Clover works graphically.
The resolution of the text screen, here, as well as in Shell and on the boot.efi screen, can be installed
with the help of
<key>ConsoleMode</key>
<string>0/Min/Max/some number</string>
The number can be found in your boot.log, or put Max - will be the maximum possible
resolution.
The design of the graphic shell depends on the theme you choose. The default theme is
selected in the variable
<key>Theme</key>
<string>metal</string>
However, the theme can also be chosen in the Control Panel, and that choice will be
decisive. If there is the wrong theme (there is no such theme.plist file on the specified path), the
theme from the plista will be chosen. If there is a non-existent theme, thenthe screen will be a built-
in theme (embedded),the last versionof Clovy. (revision 1936)
Random - the theme will be randomly selected from the list of set at each download.
Starting with the audit 4438 Clover will do it automatically metal@2x. The question for
designers is when they will make major analogues to their themes.
As for this item of confit, it looks the same for rastraand vector themes, the difference
is only in the name.
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
42
Moscow, 2021
Version 5.1, Audit 5128
contents of the folder. If there's a theme.plist, it's a melting topic. If there is a theme.svg, then it is a
vector theme.
<key>EmbeddedThemeType</key>
<string>DayTime</string>
Possible Dark and Light options. Introduced with an audit of 4644. Options were invented
before the invention of the watch, you could choose dark or light embedded themes. And
now by the hour, the day is light, at night dark.
<key>Timezone</key>
<integer>3</integer>
Clover's modern audit, 4773, introduced the concept of "time of day." When you start Clover reads
the current time from BIOS, it usually stands at greenwich, and adds to it the value of this setting,
zone. if it's between 8:00 and 8:00 p.m., it's considered a daysound_night.wav.wav or anight.
<key>PlayAsync</key>
<false/>
Beginning with the 4833 audit, there was a sound in Clover with the presence of the audioDxe.efi
driver, the author of Goldfish64, notgoing to deal with Clover, well, well, he is not against the use of
his solutions. PlayAsync determines whether the sound plays in sync with Clover's work, or
asynchronous. That is, when synchronized playback nothing works until the sound is over. When
assinechronic sound flows regardless of what is happening on the screen. Scan entries... then the
Clover interface appears, the sound continues, then the lines of the boot.efi work, the sound
continues, thenthe sound runs, and the cupcake.wav s are started in turn.
Clover 4862 had a bug, asynchronous sound hung computer. Starting with 4870, there are no
problems, you can put PlayAsync'true.
<key>CustomIcons</key>
<false/>
If you put it in the zlt'true,you'll search for an icon for each section with the operating system.
VolumeIcon.icns at the root of the section and used instead of icons set by the theme.
Clover Khaki.
43
44
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
<key>ScreenResolution</key>
<string>1024x768</string>
you can set the desired screen resolution, more than the standard 1024 x768, if the
parameters of the graphics card and the screen itself have such a mode. Clover tries to put the
greatest possible resolution, however, he may be mistaken. Check the list of available booth-log
modes.
If patchVBios'Yes is in the graphics section, you will have the maximum resolution available for
this monitor. In this case, ScreenResolution may be superfluous. With some configurations, the
PatchVBios option can be fatal - a black screen with no signs of life.
There's a subtlety here. Clover should be known for the EDID monitor. Lega being a
Clover trying to get it through the calls of INT10 BIOS, often successfully, sometimes not. UEFY
Clover asks UEFI BIOS, who probably knows EDID for the built-in graphics card, and probably
doesn't know for insert.log ed.
<key>Language</key>
<string>ru:0</string>
At the moment, the language isonly relevant to the "Help" menu called on the F1 key.
<key>Mouse</key>
<dict>
</dict>
<key>Enabled</key>
<true/>
<key>Speed</key>
<integer>2</integer>
<key>Mirror</key>
<false/>
<key>DoubleClick</key>
<integer>500</integer>
Enabled - there are configurations when the mouse does not work, or even hang, well, then
it can be banned.
Speed 2 is a cursor's speed, reasonable values 2 to 8. For some mice, it takes a negative speed,
moving backwards.
Mirror - and also to make the opposite direction of only one coordinate. The DoubleClick 500
is a pause in milliseconds to define a double click.
In Clover's interface, you can see legasi and uefhi loaders for installed operating systems. At the
same time, there may be several downloaders on one section. Maybe you don't need everything
Clover found, you just need an indication of a real pairof syths.
Hide - hide volumes by name, or by their UUID.
<key>Hide</key>
<array>
<string>WindowsHDD</string>
<string>BOOTX64. EFI</string>
<string>E223FF7F-F2DA-4DBB-B765-756F2D95B0FE</string>
</array>
45
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
This is an array of lines that are included in the full name of the section, look at the boot.log. This
way you can remove unnecessary sections from the menu, such as Recovery or Preboot.
Or vice versa,edicting what exactly to scan
<key>Scan</key>
<dict>
<key>Legacy</key>
<string>First</string>
<key>Entries</key>
<true/>
<key>Tool</key>
<true/>
<key>Linux</key>
<false/>
</dict>
For Legacy (i.e. downloaders launched from PBR), there are options for values
No, First, Last - don't show at all, position at the top of the list, or at the end.
Linux - don't look for linux loaders on every section, it takes a long time.
The interface can bestrestered and more subtle if you understand how and what to do.

It's for Linux. All -
any core
Newest - New oldest -
oldest First - first found
Last - the last MostRecent found - the
newest version of Earliest - the oldest
version of None - is not looking for
the kernels.
Well, Apianti, screwed up!

<dict>

<key>CustomLogo</key>
<true/> OR <false/> OR <string>Apple/Alternate/Theme/None/Path</string> OR
<data>PNG/BMP/ICNS base64 data</data>
true - default style
false - ban logo
Apple - applesabout gray ongray
Alternate - alternative apple white on black
Theme - set theme
None - there is no logo, but the background is
Path - the way to the logo file
The picture is encoded as base64 and contains PNG data.
<key>ShowOptimus</key>
<true/>
The task was simple. I have a BIOS spontaneously turns off the Optimus on the laptop, and I want
to see, if or not, when Clover is loaded, to press the key in time and to fix the situation.
Criterion - the number of graphics cards in the system, or the first Intel
Intel.
Discrete only. On the screen is the word Discrete. Very convenient!
