Decoration: theme.plist
Now the actual design is in accordance with the chosen theme. The theme.plist file is loaded out of a
folder witha theme, and is unique to each one.
/EFI/CLOVER/themes/metal/theme.plist
The first parameters of the theme are a copyright, such as
<key>Author</key>
<string>Slice</string>
<key>Year</key>
<string>2012</string>
<key>Description</key>
<string>Main metallic looking theme</string>
Next is a section with the parameters of the design
<key>Theme</key>
<dict>
The format of all the PNG images mentioned, and you need to have a correct title. For example,
The View saves files in the right format, but not always. Sometimes you need to be re-protected
through photoshop.
Part of the interface elements may be excluded by the followingset:
<key>Components</key>
<dict>
<key>Banner</key>
<true/>
<key>Functions</key>
<true/>
<key>Label</key>
<true/>
<key>Tools</key>
<true/>
<key>Revision</key>
<true/>
<key>MenuTitle</key>
<true/>
<key>MenuTitleImage</key>
<true/>
<key>Help</key>
<false/>
</dict>
If there is an element, otherwise it is not.
Theme style (starting at 3586, author Needy)
<key>BootCampStyle</key>
<true/>
By default, in the refat, the text is written in a separate line, and can be a very long
"Boot Recovery from RecoveryHDD." But this is only true if the sections are few, and each
section has its own, unique loader.
"Boot Recovery from RecoveryHDD"
"Boot macOS from RecoveryHDD"
"Boot macOS from SierraHDD"
The style of the boot-camp here is somehow inconvenient. So you
have a choice. Background screen picture:
49
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
<key>Background</key>
<dict>
<key>Type</key>
<string>Crop</string>
<key>Path</key>
<string>MetalBack.png</string>
<key>Sharp</key>
<string>0x80</string>
<key>Dark</key>
<true/>
</dict>
Path sets the name ofthe file (or rather the path!) in which the background image ison the entire
screen.
Type
Crop is to trim a large image to the size of the screen, or fill in the background.
Tile - to pave the mosaic of tiles.
Scale - stretch proportionally so that the image takes the entire screen and more, under thestrum.
In ordinary stretching, square pixels are produced, so usually some smoothing is used, however,
such smoothing spoils the edges.
In Clover made a detector of edges, its value is determined by the parameter
Sharp
If 0 is not a detector, the edges are blurred. The maximum value of 0xFF is 255 - there is no blur.
0x80 - creates some intelligent blur with sharp edges. Also paired with it works option
Dark
If it is implied that you have a dark image with white lines, itis a light image with dark lines.
<key>Banner</key>
<string>logo-trans.png</string>
A banner is a central picture and has size limits that depend on the size of the screen. For example,
in the theme dawn picture has a size of 672 × 190 pixels.
This figure can be considered as the maximum. The logo should either be made opaque,whether we
are not going to use a background image.
In the new revisions, "Banner" has options:
<key>Banner</key>
<dict>
<key>Path</key>
<string>logo_trans.png</string>
<key>ScreenEdgeX</key>
<string>left</string>
<key>ScreenEdgeY</key>
<string>top</string>
<key>DistanceFromScreenEdgeX%</key>
<integer>10</integer>
<key>DistanceFromScreenEdgeY%</key>
<integer>10</integer>
<key>NudgeX</key>
<integer>8</integer>
<key>NudgeY</key>
<integer>5</integer>
</dict>
50
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Path is the way to file, including a folder such as VariantA'Logo.png
ScreenEdgeX - horizontal report point (left/right/centre)
DistanceFromScreenEdgeX is a banner position relative to the point of the report, as a percentage
of the sizeof thescreen.
NudgeX - 1% - is a lot, for the screen 1920 will already be 19 pixels, so in this option we do
refinement in pixel units.
Similarly vertically.
<key>Selection</key>
<dict>
<key>Color</key>
<string>0xF3F3F380</string>
<key>Small</key>
<string>Select_trans_small.png</string>
<key>Big</key>
<string>Select_trans_big.png</string>
<key>OnTop</key>
<true/>
</dict>
Color is the color of the line selection in the menu. The artist sets the color according to the overall
tone of the theme.
Big and Small are drawings that highlight icons in the main menu in the top row - large, and in
the bottom - small.
OnTop - the location of the selection drawing (roar 1983). False - highlight thedisk icon
(traditionally for Refit), True - over the icon (traditionally for Chameleon).
<key>Font</key>
<dict>
<key>Type</key>
<string>Load</string>
<key>Path</key>
<string>BoG_LucidaConsole_10W_NA.png</string>
<key>CharWidth</key>
<integer>10</integer>
<key>Proportional</key>
<true/>
</dict>
Type is a type of font. 3706), and a dozen downloads - Load. .. In this case, the file name
is listed in the following Path option - BoG_LucidaConsole_10W_NA.png
For each theme, its author has chosen the font that best suits his design, you should look in the attached
file.
The following agreements (blackosx) have been adopted for font names
BoG - Black On Gray - black on a graybackground.
LucidaConsole is the name of the original font. 10W
- letter width
NA - No Antialiasing.
The size of one character in the 16 pixel file, however, the characters themselves take up less space,
so the following parameter indicates the optimal width, and this, again, depends on the author's
design.
Proportional - Starting with the revision of 3217, it has been possible to use proportional
fonts.
51
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Alittle more space than m. Mono-shirini font is, for example, a Courier,proportional to the Times.
However, Clover is able to compact and mono-wide fonts, but still, the result will be better with
specially prepared. Here, for example, is a picture
compare the width of the letters i and m.
CharWidth 10 - you can use the width recommended by the author of the font, and you can change to
your own way. 9 - thicker, 11 - cut.
Starting with the 3537 revision, this option affects the width of the text in Options Menu, because it
always has a Proportional'false, and the width of the letters is entirely determined by this parameter,
and in the line of information the text is proportional, and is compressed in fact for each letter, even
if the matrix is much wider.
<key>Badges</key>
<dict>
<key>Show</key>
<true/>
<key>Inline</key>
<true/>
<key>Swap</key>
<false/>
<key>OffsetX</key>
<integer>32</integer>
<key>OffsetY</key>
<integer>32</integer>
<key>Scale</key>
<integer>7</integer>
</dict>
Badzik is a small drawing in the bottom right corner of the main picture. It was originally conceived
that the main icon depicts a disk (as in a bootcamp), and badjik tells what operating system there is.
Show - Whether to show the badge.
Swap - to change the meaning of the icon and badge.
Inline - show the badge in a line with information about the chosen icon.
52
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
OffsetX and OffsetY - the badjik offset from the top left corner.
Scale is the size of a badge in X/16 units from the original size (example 7/16). That is, in a
standard theme the size of 48 pixels, which corresponds to 6/16 of the standard icon.
<key>Scroll</key>
<dict>
<key>Width</key>

<integer>N</integer>
<key>ScrollHeight</key>
<integer>N</integer>
</dict>
Because the settings menu may be longer than the vertical screen size, the scroll appears in the
menu, its settings are setwith a theme, and there are default settings for the pictures included in
the theme.

The subtitle images in each submeal are animated, and this animation is played on the selected item of
the main menu.

right click.

with names lie
ML_Anim_000.png

55
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
In the case of missed frames, the last acting one will be used, i.e. 002-007 will be framed
001, and as 009-013 - frame 008.
Frames - 15 - the total number of frames in the animation.
FrameTime - 100 - a time interval between frames in ms. Variable interval is realized with the help
of missed frames.
Once - if you specify the animation will be played only once, before leaving the main menu
(clicking the right mouse key into the milk on the main screen, or the Escape key).
ScreenEdgeX - horizontal report point (left/right/centre)
DistanceFromScreenEdgeX - the position of the film relative to the point of the report, as a
percentage of the size of the screen.
NudgeX - 1% - is a lot, for the screen 1920 will already be 19 pixels, so in this option we do
refinement in pixel units.

with another resolution, correctly recalculate the location of the items.

Vector themes
Why it's needed
The decision to create a design of Clover's GUI based on vector graphics arose from one
user's complaint that you pray to run with the same flash drive on different computers, on one
small screen, and then a large theme just does not fit, and on the other a huge screen, and then
theusual theme looks too small, and the text @2x is generally unreadable. That is, in Clover's
confit is the theme of metal, and depending on the resolution of the monitor loads either metal or
metal@2x.
Then I decided to make a really scalable theme based on vector graphics. has avery
specific size in pixels, and you can write an instruction to qlt'"circle cx"100" cy""200" r"50"gt; and
instruct the drawing program to make a circle on the screen with this position and such a radius in
abstractunits, which will be recalculated to the right number of pixels depending on the size of
the screen.
You can't make a good design on the circles and squares, so you need some standard
vector graphics with a large number of features. A clover-type open project certainly requires an
open standard, well-documented, and supported by drawing programs.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalable_Vector_Graphics
Now the next question, how do I make her support? It is necessary to interpret these
commands, and to draw something appropriate, to put it mildly is not an easy task. And then I find
the nanosvg project, https://github.com/memononen/nanosvg
It is ospensor, allows you to copy to itself, it contains only two files in the language C, that is, you
can use almost unchanged. The author stopped the development, despite manysuggestions for
improvement, like done like this, use it as it is.I've yet to make them possible within the capabilities
of EDK2.
But the theory without practice is dead, I can't do support topics unless I have a sample of
such. Let the whole theme be a single file with thename theme.svg that any viewer, such as
GoogleChrome, Safari, or just by the space of the zuickLook, Clover will look like Clover's
interface.
59
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Thetheme's style means that on a screen of any size the interface will look the same, the
icons will take up the same percentage of the screen size, in the sense of the width of the theme
is not scaled, in favor of saving squares.
Vector themes still have an advantage in using fonts. There was only one font in the thread
theme, somehow made proportional or not, whereas in the vector it can be several different fonts,
really proportional, and very smooth.
Although yes, I understand, those who put Timeout 0, or TextOnly, or embedded, this
chapter is not interesting at all.
How to make a vector theme
First, you need to put a drawing program in which you will be comfortable to draw, and
which can export this drawing in the SVG format version 1.1. Although with some improvements
compared to this standard. My brief review
1. Adobe Illustrator . version the higherthe better.
2. Inkscape. Advantage Number 1 is its freeness, and accordingly the legality. SVG is its native
format, but it still has a number of its SVG extensions that are not supported by anyone else.
Hooray! Version 1.0 now runs in makos from 10.11 to 10.15!
3. LibreOffice Draw. It's also freeand legal.
4. CorelDraw.Just don't know, didn't enjoy it.
5. BoxySVG.allowing you to create and edit individual SVG drawings, and immediately
control the code created, unlike older brethren who will form the code only at the final
export. Other programs will not consider, at your discretion, only follow the standard version 1.1,
and the recommendations below.
Secondly, the theme drawing.svg should consist of quite certain components with quite
certain names, as Clover chooses from there drawings by names. Full list:
Background, Banner, selection_big, selection_small, selection_indicator, pointer,
scrollbar_background, scrollbar_holder, checkbox, checkbox_checked, radio_button,
radio_button_selected,
by some error the scrollbar was defined with a minus instead of emphasizing, because so in the
rastra tems, in the vector corrected.
Disc icons
vol_internal is an internal hard drive; vol_external
is an external media (usually USB); vol_optical -
CD/DVD drive;
vol_clover - downloader drive (not used?) vol_internal_hfs -
disk section with HFS file system; vol_internal_apfs - disk
section with APFS file system; vol_internal_ntfs - disk section
with NTFS file system;
60
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
vol_internal_ext3 - disk section with EXT file system;
vol_recovery - Recovery, RecoveryHD and other Operating
System Icons
os_clover
os_legacy
os_unknown
os_tiger Mac OS X 10.4 Tiger
os_leo Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard
os_snow Mac OS X 10.6 Snow
Leopard os_lion Mac OS X 10.7 Lion
os_cougar OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
os_mav OS X 10.9 Mavericks
os_yos OS X 10.10 Yosemite
os_cap OS X 10.11 El Capitan
os_sierra macOS 10.12 Sierra
os_hsierra macOS 10.13 High Sierra
os_moja macOS 10.14 Mojave
os_cata macOS 10.15 Catalina
os_bigsur macOS 10.16/11.0 Big
Sur
os_win Mandatory, used when there is no icon for the current Windows OS (on the volume with the
NTFS file system)
os_vista Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
os_freedos
os_freebsd
os_linux Mandatory, used when there is no icon for theLinux SN (on the volume with the EXT file
system)
os_ubuntu
os_suse
the rest of the Linux may someday be listed.
Second-row service icons
tool_shell, func_clover, func_options, func_about, func_reset and func_shutdown,and
func_help thatis displayed when calling for help on F1.
Third, the location of these icons inside the theme file.svg plays a role for previews, but not
for Clover himself. With the exception of Banner. this is a central picture, and it is not just located
in a fixed place in the center of the screen, as it was in the rastra themes, the banner is now located
onthe screen as intended in thesubject.
Another point, all sorts of boottons and scrolls in general are not needed for previews, as
well as numerous icons of axes and discs, so they should be hidden from previews, but left
available to Clover. It helps to attribut visibility"hidden, which, however, Clover will ignore when
he needs to draw this icon on the screen.
Vector themes support the new "night design" feature.
The built-in clock will tell Clover how much time it is, recalculate them locally, and the time
from 8:00 to 20:00 is considered day and the rest of _night the night.
For example os_mac pointer_night, in addition to the main banner with the name "Banner" you can
draw a second picture with the name "os_mac_night Banner_night."
61
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
completely different. So we have actually two different themes in one, oneand displayed by day, the
second night.
Each icon, in addition, must contain an invisible rectangle that defines its boundaries. The
reason is simple, the icon may have content smaller than its size, and Clover should know its full
size, which should bemasked BoundingRect_.
Example.
<g id="tool_shell" transform="translate(300, 600)">
<rect visibility="hidden" id="BoundingRect_ts" y="0" width="64" height="64"/>
<g transform="matrix(0.55 0 0 0.55 15 10)">
<use xlink:href="#knopka" width="85.5" height="85.5" />
</g>
<g transform="matrix(0.55 0 0 0.55 25 43)">
<text class="st35 st36 st38 st39">$_</text>
</g>
</g>
Decipher word by word.
<g ... It's a group of images that make up one total. Her name is "tool_shell," which Clover uses to
paint The Shell icon in the second row. transform""translate (300, 600)" - sets the icon shift on previews.
Clover ignores.
The second line is the second line of the "lt.rect.. This is the same service invisible rectangle that
sets the size of the icon, in our case 64 x64. A pixel unit, compared to the size of the theme itself,
which is 1600x900. Accordingly, the 1800-high screen will have a 128 x128, for example.
In the third line again there is a combination of images, and the general transformation: the size in
relation to the above boundaries, and the shift within them. The fact that in the graphics editor you
are comfortable to draw on another scale, but then you need to bringthe m ashtab of individual
icons to the scale of the whole theme.
Use xlink:href"#knopka" width""85.5" height""85.5" / zgt; - this in the original project
nanosvg was not, and in general it is probably from SVG2.0 - support of symbols. I just use
the.svg same picture.
With the transformation in the Luster trouble, probably as in other vector editors. It is a
sharp recount of thecoordinates of all the internal objects of the image, instead of leaving the
attribute of transformation outside the group.
SVG inClover
Far from ideal. But we can see that very much done by the Illustrator works as expected.
The figuresare : zlt'rect'gt;
The figures can be grouped together in groups and in the simvof the ola.
62
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
association can contain a name and transformation.
The group is a static association, as defined, anddisplayed.
This defines a group of shapes that together create vol_internal an image of an internal disk. Within
this group, the obligatory element of the "BoundingRect_001" class""st0" width"128"
height"128"/"gt;" It is needed to redo the group sizes, inorder for Clover to position this image
correctly, because the inner drawings are likely to be smaller than the overall size.
The symbol is a dynamic merging. Browsers will not show the characters identified in the theme,
this set of objects is a blank for use by other objects.
Used it will be the operator of the example:
<symbol id="HDIconBase" viewBox="-64 -64 128 128">
<rect id="BoundingRect_3_" x="-64" y="-64" class="st0" width="128" height="128"/>
<path id="bottom_3_" class="st1" d="M26,49h-52c-3.9,0-7-3.1-7-7v-66c0-3.9,3.1-7,7-
7h52c3.9,0,7,3.1,7,7v66C33,45.9,29.9,49,26,49
z"/>
<path id="top_3_" class="st2" d="M26,47h-52c-2.8,0-5-2.2-5-5v-55c0-2.8,2.2-5,5-
5h52c2.8,0,5,2.2,5,5v55C31,44.8,28.8,47,26,47z"
/>
</symbol>
Here is a symbol consisting of two closed curves (path) and one service square. Styles/classes are
defined in the file, here for brevity Omitt.
Drawing this figure inside the icon
<g id="osx_moj">
<rect id="BoundingRect-2" class="st0" width="128" height="128"/>
<use xlink:href="#HDIconBase" width="128" height="128" x="-64" y="-64"
transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 64.0876 64)" style="overflow:visible;" />
xlink:href is a link and points to a symbol called HDIconBase.
Unlike the SVG standard, Clover doesn't understand the references to bands, only to symbols. Alas
and ah, but this should be taken into account, creating your own design. That is, transfer the group
to the symbol, and make a reference to this symbol.
Fills and strokes.
About the bypass to can not say anythingconcrete.
A simple option is a homogeneous veto pour. The color is given by 16-year-old RGB constants:
fill: "#ffcc00" is orange. There are also valid numbers and percentages.
Above the standard in Clover color names: fill:"white" and many more names, I will not copy
a hundred words. Use SVG standard, and if anything, see Clover's source.
Another type of pouring is gradients.
linearGradient - there's 100% match to the mouth.
radialGradient - unfortunately, there is no focus point yet, so the radial gradient in Clover may
not look quite as laid out in the design. conicGradient - this is not in the standard (yet?).
63
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
And how can I not support if my Metal theme is created on the tapex gradienents?! Another
question, how did I draw it then? In Photoshop, he can do it.not by radius, but by angle, counting
the angle, it's stop"0.0" and the 360 angle is stop"1.0."
For the design you can make a radial gradient, and then the text editor to turn it into a
conical.
Dithering.And this is also not in the standard, although,in myeye, begs. there will be no
intermediates, but there will be no intermediate values (noticeably on the Clovy theme of the
backfield with circlesin the earlyvers and the Clover, without the support of dithering).
The standard does not have a sample syntaxand for this case, so developed his.
Code:
<radialGradient clover:ditherCoarse="16" id="GrayRadialBackground_5_" cx="441.2867" cy="0.7502"
r="1.0023" gradientTransform="matrix(5.400000e-14 768 -874.24 4.700000e-14
1338.8547 -338690.875)" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
<stop offset="0" style="stop-color:#7C7C7C"/>
<stop offset="1" style="stop-color:#5E5E5E"/>
</radialGradient>
The digital parameter coarse - roughness, determines the length of viewing points, between what and
what to choose. For large drawings, as background, picked up a value of 16.
There's enough for theicons, and it looks very smooth and almost imperceptible.
Illustrations later, however, they were laid out on a sleigh at different times.
Filling with a pattern (pattern)
Here we are very far from full-time.
The pattern is a PNG image, and it fills the desired path on the scale to completely fill it
with it.
Why do you need it? The fact is that many of Apple's logos are photos, that is, rastre, and we have
options: vectorize the stretch (not too beautifulabout), draw something completely different, or
turn the rastra into the vector.
In The Illustrator, there is such a function
1. We include the PNG drawing in the design. (embed).
2. We translate the shape into a pattern
3. In the properties of the filled figure, we specify to fill in a pattern with such-and-such ID. The
only problem is that the picture does not multiply, as it should be according to the specification,
and fills the entire space with scaling in the size of the canvas.
Oh yes, still a limitation
<pattern id="pattern_1234". >
64
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Clover's pattern ID is required to include the word pattern, otherwise Clover has no way of
understanding what we're filling a shape with. However, the use of built-in PNG doesn't make much
sense, in which case it was better to do just a PNG theme.
Clips (clipPath)
Unlike the original nanosvg project, I have clips supported, but the algorithm is notmine, but
taken from the pool-requeste. I do not know how it works, and how adequate. In general, you
can use, but carefully.
Texts and SriLanka
In the original nanosvg project, this feature is missing, but Clover without text is
unthinkable, so I did. I don't even remember about other vector editors, for everyone one way
or another the problem.
There's a set of rules for Clover's vector theme.
1. You can use multiple fonts, while there's only one in the spread themes. One of them, the main
one, should be included in the theme file itself.svg. You can turn everything on,just the file will
swell.svg in size. However, at the same time, we will lose the differences in fonts. That is, Clover
will see all the fonts, Safari only built-in, and Chrome will not see any.
2. At this point, it's possible to identify three text styles (font, size, and color): for options
menu, help and about screens, and for messages at the bottom of the screen, the same style is
headlined. Maybe in the future we will expand the use of styles.
<g id="MenuRows" class="st0"><text class="st1">Menu</text></g>
<g id="HelpRows" class="st0"><text class="st2">Help</text></g>
Here st1, st2, st3 classes should define text styles, and the st0 class should simply hide
unnecessary text from previews.
As we can see, everything is standard here, just a different purpose. Here we write the text only to
mark the styles. And Clover himself will find something to write these styles, by id group, that is,
for the menu "MenuRows" and for help on F1 "HelpRows".
3. But in general, in icons you can use text as an element of decoration. You can use any font, but
make it built-in, and maybe embed this font with the option "only used glyph" - that is not the
entire font, which on average weighs 500kb, and Chinese and all 30Mb, but only used in the icon
letters.
Moreover, you can apply transformations to the text: turn, tilt, etc. You can do a stroke without
pouring, the letters will be "white" - I do not remember what it is called, in the wind of such style
is not, in The Mac is, and with moh-old years.
Unlike the standard, there is no textPath - the location of the text along the line, for example, around
the perimeter of the circle. Maybe someday...
The size of the text is set in pixels. That is .st8'font-size:16px; but it's in the size of the theme
design. Inthe work, the theme will be scaled in the size of the monitor, along with
65
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
letter sizes. Thus, for the theme in the design of 1366 x768 normally looks text with the size of 12rh, on
the monitor with a vertical 2144 it will be almost 36rh.
4. Ineed a font containing special unicode symbols for design. For example, ⌘. This typeface I
found, it occupies 30MB, where do I take it? The illustrator seeing an unfamiliar font replaces
it with his own, and kills everything I've done in my subject....
The first rule used is the font to be installed in the system, not just in the theme. So that's
what .................................................................................................................................... I call it.
its built-in Font ArialMT, Helvetica and the like, inserting there glyphs from the font I want, the
illustrator shows incorrectly, because the other font, but at least does not kill. Kvikluk shows
correctly and I can handle bymoving the letters to where they need to be.
I still have inscriptions right on the icons. I just did this as an illustrator, his font, and pointed out
the export font "used only glyphs." So, we have to introduce a text containing all english
letters, numbers and punctuation in the original design of the theme. Like,
<text class="st1">ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ...
And so on. Then the Illustrator when importing the theme will not forget about all these symbols.
So put this text in an invisible group.
5. Once you use the Illustrator and ask him to implement SVG fonts, only used fonts, or
whatever, then you should check that he's a snr with it.
Here, for example,
is the code:
<font horiz-adv-x="2048">
<!-- Helvetica is a registered trademark of Linotype AG -->
<!-- Copyright: Copyright 2018 Adobe System Incorporated. All rights reserved. -->
<font-face font-family="MyriadPro-Regular" units-per-em="2048" underline-position="-155" underline-thickness="101"/>
<missing-glyph horiz-adv-x="1298" />
<glyph unicode=" " horiz-adv-x="569"/>
<glyph unicode="E" horiz-adv-x="1366" d="M175,1469l1071,0l0,-180l-877,0l0,-446l811,0l0,- 170l-811,0l0,-498l892,0l0,-175l-
1086,0z"/>
<glyph unicode="H" d="M161,1469l201,0l0,-607l764,0l0,607l201,0l0,-1469l-201,0l0,687l- 764,0l0,-687l-201,0z"/>
First, there is no bbox in the font-face element" and it is strictly necessary, look for what should be
there, fit in with your hands.
Secondly, scroll through the entire list so that each glyph has an attribut horiz-adv-x"", it determines
the width of the letter, that is, where you can draw the next one.
There is a default, but itdoes not always correspond to the real width of the letter, as a result such a
letter will attack the neighbor.
In this example, this attibut is missing from the letter H, and its real value is 1479, which is not
obvious. You can take from the letter about the same width, and you can nthe ute series of
experiments to do a little more, or a little less.
Subject attributes
Clover needs his add-ons compared to the standard, and this is done in its namespace. To do this,
the top of the file is added
xmlns:clover="https://sourceforge.net/projects/cloverefiboot"
It's a legitimate operation. After that, we can add notlegitimate things, but with the prefix
clover: as above did with Dithering.
66
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Another example of conical gradients is a deviation from the standard, so we had to introduce an
additional attribute that is acceptable standard, but indicating to Clover that you need to act outside the
box.
<radialGradient clover:conic="1" id="knopkaUp" cx="14142.7324" cy="-40300.8711" r="37.5003"
gradientTransform="matrix(-0.706 -0.7082 0.7082 -0.706 38525.8438 -
18436.5312)" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
<stop offset="0" style="stop-color:#FFF8D4"/>
<stop offset="0.1" style="stop-color:#EEE0B4"/>
<stop offset="0.5" style="stop-color:#161616"/>
<stop offset="0.9" style="stop-color:#EEE0B4"/>
<stop offset="1" style="stop-color:#FFF8D4"/>
</radialGradient>
It describes the radial gradient, and this is how it will be understood by other people's programs. But
Clover will interpret itas a conical gradient.
And now the general theme settings
<clover:theme
BootCampStyle="0"
SelectionOnTop="0"
SelectionColor="0x80808080"
NonSelectedGrey="0"
VerticalLayout="0"
BackgroundScale="crop"
BackgroundDark="1"
BackgroundSharp="0x80"
Badges="show"
BadgeOffsetX="0x0"
BadgeOffsetY="0xA"
BadgeScale="0x10"
LayoutBannerOffset="10"
LayoutButtonOffset="0"
CharWidth="16"
AnimeFrames="39"
FrameTime="2000"
Version="100500"
Year="2018"
Author="Me"
Description="My cool vector theme for Clover"/>
All of these attributes are copied from the settings of the threads, and serve the same purposes.
Aboutthe bottom, not all those attributes are needed and used.
Conclusion
Vector themes are more promising, and I no longer have the slightest desire to deal with the
rastra. There is night mode, and beautiful fonts, and scaling. It is possible to make dynamic pictures
like animation, only on another level. To do this, you needto implement deviations from the SVG
standard. and with this coped with only three: Clovy with the theme Of Clovy, I with the theme of
cesium, and blackosx withthe theme of BGM_SVG, though he has not yet decided on the final
varian.
Cesium theme, daytime view.

Moscow, 2021г

Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Fixing the hardware
Create a config.plist file
Actually, Clover does the configuration automatically. But the machine is never perfect, so
the user has the ability to change different settings through the config.plist file, or just in the
Options menu when working in theGUI e. Do you think you'll set up the settings better than the
machine?
This is an xml file, however, and it's convenient to treat it as a text file at the moment. .app
You can edit this file by text editor or a specialized program like PlistEditor or Xcode, if there is
one.
<key>#SuspendOverride</key>
<false/>
Lattice means that this key is excluded from the con figs altogether. Clover uses the default
setting.
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>#Custom</key>
<dict>
And here the whole section of Custom is excluded.
The general rule is, if you don't know what value to give to a setting, exclude it altogether from the
file, or put it on the file. Don't leave the option uns paralysed! And even more so, do not put the
value, which do not understand!
It offers adredged version of making such a confit for your computer:
–
Install the default model file, with only safe settings.
–
load into Clover's graphics shell and go to the Options menu (there's a button in the
lower ppoison, or just on the "O") key;
–
keys up/down/enter/escape to walk around the entire menu, and try to understand what
they write and why;
–
that understandably correct, incomprehensible leave as is.
–
load into the system. If you failed, we repeat the operation, but already changing the
parameters, to the complete success.
Entering the system, we go to the terminal, and recruit a team
cd ~/App/clover-genconfig >config.plist
Assuming you've pre-put the genconfig utility in the folder. In this way, you'll get an almost
complete config.plist with your most successful settings with which you managed to load.
Attention! The clover-genconfig utility depends onclover's roar!
Since the 5100 audits, we have a Clover program.app that has the same genconfig function,
and this utility is now excluded.
A little more handmade for complete perfectionism. Below is a description of the settings of the confit.
69
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
All options are combined by groups: ACPI, Boot, CPU, Devices, DisableDrivers, GUI, Graphics,
KernelAndKextPatches, RtVariables, SystemParameters, SMBIOS, BootGraphics.
Boot
<key>Timeout</key>
<integer>5</integer>
If the loader entered the GUI and paused for 5 seconds before the startof the system
bydefault.
-1 (minus one) - the loader is included in the menu, does not attempt to start.
A pause of 25 seconds in the default confit is made to make the user admire animation. The
countdown and autostart only occurs if the correct DefaultVolume is set, and not the onein the
default confit.
The timeout doesn't work unless NVRAM defines the default system. Go to the system, the
DownloadD'S System, and reboot it.
The Timeout'0 option can be replaced with a version
<key>Fast</key>
<true/>
In this case, you can save you extra load time by not downloading the interface and its
elements. That is, and no chance to get any amends in case of an error. Saving a whole second
will probably enrich you?!
The system will start loading immediately from the section set in the following setting
<key>DefaultVolume</key>
<string>MacHDD</string>
the name of the section, as you called it, how you displayed in the downloader's log.
However, the name can also be given to NVRAM after the reboot of the "Startup Disk" control
panel. The name givento NVRAM is a priority. That is, we will be loaded from the volume from
which we were loaded last time. If the setting is not set at all, it is only on the control panel.
You can also identify the uploader by default
<key>DefaultLoader</key>
<string>bootmgfw.efi</string>
That is, if there are several downloaders on one section, we will choose the one required to
download by default. In this example, we expect to ship winddows by default to UEF. If not
specified, then boot.efi. Again, "Boot Drive" will change this installation during the restart, so
ensures the auto-launch Of Windows through the Mac panel.
<key>Legacy</key>
<string>PBR</string>
70
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021г
Legacy Boot, which is needed to run older versions of Windows and Linux, depends very much on
the hardware part, on the construction of bios, so several algorithms have been developed, and the
choice of algorithm is made in this vein. Options:
LegacyBiosDefault is for those UEFI BIOS that have a LegacyBios protocol.
PBRtest, PBR, PBRsata - variants of the PBR boot algorithm, whoever is lucky.
In general, to achieve unconditional work legasi-but failed. It's easier and better to forget about the
legosysystem, and put UEFI system variants.
<key>Arguments</key>
<string>-v arch=i386</string>
These are arguments that are transmitted to boot.efi, and it, in turn, transfers part of them to the core of
the system. A specific list of kernel arguments should be found in Apple's documentation. A list of
arguments required by boot.efi can be foundfrom the manual at com.apple.boot.plist.
The following kernel
mach_kernel.amd slide are best
known
darkwake=0
nvda_drv=1
To download UEFI to 10.8 or 10.9, you need a slide-0 key. Since the audit of 1887
it is added automatically when needed. Starting with the 4369 audit, there's an
AptioMemoryFix driver, and you can't write with it, implying an automatic4369.
Starting with audit 3712 (actually later due to bugs), in the Details menu caused by the space, you have
the opportunity to mouse choose the desired arguments from the list:
L"arch=i386", //0
L"arch=x86_64", //1
L"-v ", //2
L"-s ", //3
L"-x ", //4
L"nv_disable=1", //5
L"slide=0", //6
L"darkwake=0", //7
L"-xcpm", //8
L"-gux_no_idle", //9
L"-gux_nosleep", //10
L"-gux_nomsi", //11
L"-gux_defer_usb2", //12
L"keepsyms=1", //13
L"debug=0x100", //14
L"kextlog=0xffff", //15 L"-alcoff",
//16
L"-shikioff", //17
L"nvda_drv=1" //18
It's a good place to be. In Clover 4200 and above, the number of arguments is reduced to purely
nuclear, or the menu is too long, and many of these arguments and not particularly who needs.
<key>Debug</key>
<false/>
This key used to be calledLog, which caused a misunderstanding of why and how.
Installing a value in the zlt'true/gt; will seriously slow down, but it gives you the opportunity after
the restart to find out what the problem was, because each step will be accompanied by a recording
of the debug file.log on the disk. And if you started with a flash drive, it will work even slower.
М
Ever khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128, 2021
Cl
68
if you're all hanging, you can click Reset, and then look for the file
/EFI/CLOVER/misc/debug.log, which cumulatively records all logs for all downloads while
this option is displayed. Starting with the 3063 revision, you still won't be sitting at the black
Ekreon - you'll see the download process on the screen!
<key>NoEarlyProgress</key>
<true/>
These extra labels will disappear
<key>XMPDetection</key>
<string>-1</string>
Thisdepends on the BISE, and mainly affects the correct detector of installed memory.
<key>Secure</key>
<true/>
Safe download. This invention of Microsoft caused a heated response in the computer world, they
say on new computers only Windows 8 will work, and in the world of Hakintosha cried "end of
hacking!". But everything was not so sad.
69
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Apianti decided to do a little more.
<key>Policy</key>
<string>Deny/Allow/Query/Insert/WhiteList/BlackList./User</string>
Deny - download only signed files.
Allow - download any
Query - ask the host
Insert - insert signature in the WhiteList
database - allow on the List BlackList -
excluded on the list
User - first check the lists, and then ask the user.
<key>WhiteList</key>
<array>
<string>SOMEPATH.efi</string>
</array>
<key>BlackList</key>
<array>
<string>USB(0x1)/HD(0x0,0x1038833...) \EFI\BOOT\BOOTX64.efi</string>
</array>
You may still need the key of ignoring the hibernet, for the simple reason that the image is good,
but the technology itself does not work on this computer.
<key>NeverHibernate</key>
<false/>
Or maybe we're very happy with Hiberne, and we don't want to hang around for five seconds
waiting for that to happen. Then we'll write
<key>SkipHibernateTimeout</key>
<true/>
The second method of hibernet:
<key>StrictHibernate</key>
<true/>
This only works if there is an iron NVRAM, but it is compatible with FileVault2 technology,
where the old method does not work. There's news. Lilu'HibernateFixup cupcakes allow you to
save nvram.plist when you care in Hibernate, that is, partially emulate the work of the iron
NVRAM, and thus help to use StrictHibernate with fashion 25 on computers with emulating
NVRAM.
<key>RtcHibernateAware</key>
<true/>
The key is to work safely with RTC while going into hibernation. Written by vit9696, questions to
him. He claimed that for the systems 10.13.4 only so, but I have at 10.13.6 the key is still stored in
NVRAM. However, for other reasons, it isnot rt to RTC, but to another wake-up algorithm in
10.13.6.
70
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>HibernationFixup</key>
<true/>
Author: lvs1974, explained in his theme how it works and when.
<key>SignatureFixup</key>
<true/>
When you go into hibernation, the system leaves a signature in the image, which is then
checked by boot.efi.
And sometimes the system tries to fall into the reover-fashion, but at the same time loaded with
the wrong disk, we have a lot of systems, it's Hakintosh. To get out ofthe bewitched ring in the
confit we write
<key>NeverDoRecovery</key>
<true/>
With FileVault2 technology, you've got the option to use hotkey, but you need to cancel
appointments already made in Clover.
<key>DisableCloverHotkeys</key>
<false/>
SystemParameters
<key>CustomUUID</key>
<string>511CE200-1000-4000-9999-010203040506</string>
Your computer's unique id number. If you don't put this key in, some of the hardware
information will be generated, if you want complete control over what's going on, write your 16-
point numbers.
But, for God's sake, don't copy my exemplary numbers!
<key>InjectSystemID</key>
<false/>
The same number will be injected in a different way, and the properties of the system will be
converted into something else. To do this, we put the value that is present with
Chameleon in the IODeviceTree registry: /efi/platform-gt-id. Then in the profile we will see a
different meaning, but the same as before with Chameleon.
New users no longer know what "as before..." They're already with Clover. It's almost always
enough to put in this setting and no custom. If, however, a non-lethal number is generated, it will
not be easy to understand where the legs grow from.
<key>BacklightLevel</key>
<string>0x0101</string>
71
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
This property is being integrated into the system, and the system is aware of its existence.
However, the impact is only noticeable on very rare configurations. What is this? The brightness
of the monitor... as the name suggests. This property is also read from NVRAM, and, by default,
usesthe value that the system has set.
Since the 1865 audit, additional Clover keys have been introduced:
<key>InjectKexts</key>
<string>Detect</string>
Italways happens if there is no FakeSMC in the kesh.
Whenever possible, the system starts with a cache, and it's up to the system to know if it's
possible to use cache or to re-create it. If you mean Yes,Clover will be forced to inject cupcakes,
even if they are in the kesh.
Do not! Better bet
<true/>
This can be done in the Details menu called the space key on the system icon.
<key>NoCaches</key>
<true/>
The option worked in systems up to 10.7. It's only downloading cupcakes, no kes. In general, a
strange desire to write this parameter in a config. Someone probably didn't load it. But today the
parameter is useless, the system in any case is loaded from kesha.
<key>NvidiaWeb</key>
<true/>
Puts a flag to download the Nwidia Web Driver, the default value you can change in Clover's
interface in the Details menu caused by a space on the system icon. The old method of prescribing
in boot-arg worked only up to the Captain. In Sierre and above that method does not work, so it is
taken to a separate point of confiscation.
Smbios
This group of settings is needed for your PC's mimicry under the Mac. Clover will do this
automatically based on the CPU model, video card, and mobility trait. Onenako, you may want
another choice.
<key>ProductName</key>
<string>MacBook1,1</string>
SMBIOS.table1->ProductName
You can only specify the name of the product, and Clover will calculate all the other parameters
corresponding to this model on your own tables.
72
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
The new options will be a priority. However, I will not list the list of names familiar to Clover,
cutchen, only 83 models, I will not list.
For other options, fill all the fields by hand. In case you used a model unknown to Clover, all fields
will be initially filled with data from MacPro3.1,iMac13.1 starting with the 3900 audit, andmorere-
recorded with your data if you gave it.
If the model is not set, clover will put something from this list, see in the menu, how satisfied you
are with this choice. Change at your discretion.
It is desirable to enter their serial numbers. You can take an exemplary one and change one
letter in the middle. It usually goes away. The first three and the last four cannot be changed.
<key>SmUUID</key>
<string>00000000-0000-1000-8000-010203040506</string>
SMBIOS.table1->Uuid
It seems to make sense to write here the mac address of your network card (the last six pairs of
characters). This GUID will also be used if CustomUUID is not specified. And it is better not to set
this parameter.
<key>FirmwareFeatures</key>
<string>0xC0001403</string>
SMBIOS.table128->FirmwareFeatures
These numbers go beyond the SMBIOS standard, it's something specific to Apple. In different
real Macs you can find different figures, there is no description anywhere, except that in the
sources of bless can be found
&& (featureFlags & 0x00000001)) {
contextprintf(context, kBLLogLevelVerbose, "Legacy mode suppported\n");
Therefore, we also need to have an odd number here. In Clover's new revisions, Sherlock made an
automatic calculation of the "best" value. I don't know what thisis about.
Vit9696 has done some work to define these bits, see
https://github.com/acidanthera/EfiPkg/blob/master/Include/IndustryStandard/AppleFeatures.h
<key>PlatformFeature</key>
<integer>3</integer>
SMBIOS.table133->PlatformFeature
This option is found in real Macs and is used by the Captain, however, what affects is not yet
found.
If the value is not spelled out, table 133 will not be created.
<key>BoardSerialNumber</key>
<string>C02032101R5DC771H</string>
SMBIOS.table2->SerialNumber
This Clover option delivers one specific. You have to set up your numbers. It's for iCloud and iMessage
to work. The length is necessarily 17 letters, capital Latin and numbers. The room in Clover is
probably banned for a long time.
<key>BoardType</key>
<integer>10</integer>
73
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
SMBIOS.table2->BoardType
This option is introduced for McPro, which has not 10 - Motherboard, and 11 - ProcessorBoard,
apparently for historical reasons.
<key>BoardVersion</key>
<string>MacBook1,1</string>
SMBIOS.table2->BoardVersion
Yes, there should be a model here, too.
<key>Mobile</key>
<true/>
In fact, Clovep always correctly calculates whether this platform is mobile (i.e. battery power,
which requires energy savings), or not. And the option is necessary if for some reason we want to
cheat the system, to indicate that we do not have any battery, or vice versa.
<key>ChassisType</key>
<string>0x10</string>
SMBIOS.table3->Type
This option serves as an indirect indication of whether we have a mobile platform Here is a table on the
standard SMBIOS
MiscChassisTypeOther = 0x01,
MiscChassisTypeUnknown = 0x02,
MiscChassisTypeDeskTop = 0x03,
MiscChassisTypeLowProfileDesktop = 0x04,
MiscChassisTypePizzaBox = 0x05,
MiscChassisTypeMiniTower = 0x06,
MiscChassisTypeTower = 0x07,
MiscChassisTypePortable = 0x08,
MiscChassisTypeLapTop = 0x09,
MiscChassisTypeNotebook = 0x0A,
MiscChassisTypeHandHeld = 0x0B,
MiscChassisTypeDockingStation = 0x0C,
MiscChassisTypeAllInOne = 0x0D,
MiscChassisTypeSubNotebook = 0x0E,
MiscChassisTypeSpaceSaving = 0x0F,
MiscChassisTypeLunchBox = 0x10,
Clover picks up the value, as exhibited in real Macs, according to the model you choose. I don't know
what it affects, except mobility.
<key>ChassisAssetTag</key>
<string>LatitudeD420</string>
SMBIOS.table3->AssetTag
This field in real Macs is never filled, so we can use for our needs, for example, by tie to the
project HWSensors3.
<key>SmbiosVersion</key>

Apple has his own SMBIOS standard, Not coinciding with others, it used to be more insing was
similar to standard 2.4, and Apple inserted such a number.

<key>NoRomInfo</key>

see these values (AppleROM Information).
Oddly enough, there is no such information on real Macs, although there is such a table. If
anyone wants to look like an abbot, put this NoRomInfo key in the zlt."
<key>Trust</key>
<true/>
The option serves to resolve the dispute between SMBIOS and SPD, whose memory parameters are
recognized as more accurate, in addition to the fact that there are still internal checks. The default is
true, i.e. SMBIOS (DMI) is more accurate.
If, with neither true nor false, you can get the "correct" display of memory in the system, you are
able to prescribe everything manually (starting with the audit of 1896)

<key>SlotCount</key>

<key>Modules</key>

<dict>

</dict>
Some explanations:
Channels - the number of memory channels.
SlotCount is the total number of slots where you can insert memory bar.
Size we write in megabytes and speed in megahertz. We don't leave empty fields.

And Clover will form such tables. In order for the DDDT to have the appropriate properties

example, this
<key>ACPI</key>
<dict>
<key>DSDT</key>
<dict>
<key>Fixes</key>
<dict>
<key>FixDisplay_0100</key>
<true/>
<key>FixLAN_2000</key>
<true/>
<key>NewWay_80000000</key>
<true/>
</dict>
If you write these properties manually, they must correspond to ID
Device (GFX0)
{
.....
Name (_ADR, Zero) // _ADR: Address
Name (_SUN, 0x02)
Device (GIGE)
{
Name (_ADR, Zero) // _ADR: Address
Name (_SUN, 0x03)
Avoid ID q 0x00 and 0x01 because of optimization in zero and One. Clover may not be able to
handle such a patch.
At thispoint, such a trick is only possible with ATI, NVidia, LAN, WIFI, Firewire devices
These are predetermined names, Clover will find a device that matches that name.
If you want a more accurate match, first look at your OEM SBMIOS, which you can get from the
DarwinDumper report, what tables you have no.9, which SUN are tied to which devices. Then fix
the DSDT to match thesenaming requirements, and add yours.
Example:
Handle 0x0905, DMI type 9, 17 bytes
0000: 09 11 05 09 01 a6 08 03 03 02 00 04 02 00 00 00
0010: fe
System Slot Information Designation:
Ethernet Type: x1 PCI Express x1
Current Usage: Available Length:
Short
I
D
:
2
Characteristics:
3.3 V is provided
Hot-plug devices are supported Bus Address:
0000:00:1f.6
79
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
I mean, I have an Ethernet controller at 0000:00:1f.6, and it's supposed to
_SUN 2 (highlighted in green).
This is the device in DSDT, but it doesn't have _SUN properties!
Device (GLAN)
{
Name (_ADR, 0x001F0006) // _ADR: Address
We have to rule! Maybe in the future Clover will learn to do it automatically.
Slot--gt'type is a type of slot from the PCI list, PCIe x1, PCIe x2,... PCIe x16, which are encrypted
for brevity numbers 0, 1, 2, ... 16
In this example, PCIe x1 is encrypted as Slot. But since this device is already number 9, you
don't need to write it in the config, it is enough to write in DSDT
Device (GLAN)
{
Name (_ADR, 0x001F0006) // _ADR: Address
Name (_SUN, 0x02)
Cpu
This group of parameters helps with the definition of CPU when internal algorithms
they can't cope.
<key>FrequencyMHz</key>
<string>3200</string>
The basic frequency of the processor in MHz. Clover usually gets this value by costing an ACPI-
based timer, but if it turns out wrong, you can frame it through that key.
This key only affects the digit in the profiler systems. Cosmetics!
Forexample, I'm a Hazwell denomination of 1800, and the initial speed of 2400.
<key>BusSpeedkHz</key>
<string>133330</string>
This option, the basic frequency of the bus, is critical to the system and is passed from theloader to
the core. If the frequency is wrong, the kernel does not start at all, if the frequency does not
correspond a little, there may be problems with the clock, and very strange behavior of the system.
The value in DMI is stored in MHz, and it is inaccurate, more correctly calculated efrom the
frequency of the CPU, well, you can pick up your value more accurately, and write it in this
key in kilohertz.
One moment. Some manufacturers have a different notion that there is BusSpeed and that there is
FSBSpeed, and enter into a BIOS value four times greater.
It is clear that if ASUS writes the frequency of the 1600MHz tire, and the processor multiplier 8,
the formula will not converge, the processors at 12.8GHz do not exist.
80
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>UseARTFrequency</key>
<false/>
SkyLake processors have a new base frequency setting that changes with a smaller step than the bus
frequency, the so-called ARTFrequency, which typically has a value of 24MHz. Clover can calculate it
and pass it on to the core, and the Captain will understand it and use it.
However, in practice, the calculated frequency leads to inaccurate work, so it can simply be
banned, in which case the core of the system will act in its own way. In clover's new version of
thedoe lano rounding this figure, as vit9696 thinks there may be only three values and they are
round, up to 1MHz.
<key>QPI</key>
<string>4800</string>
In a system profiler, this value is called Processor Bus Speed or simply Bus Speed. Chameleon has
an algorithm for its calculations for the Nehalem processors (and that is the wrong one!). In Clover,
a corrected algorithm for dates from Intel has been made. There are two options in the AppleSmbios
cupcakes: either the value is already spelled out in SMBIOS, After much debate, this amount is put
in the config - write what you like (MHz) It doesn't affect the work in any way - clean water
cosmetics.
Someone argues that modern poppies should be done this way. (I've got it!)
<key>Type</key>
<string>0x0201</string>
This option was invented by Apple and is used in the "About This Mac" window, which
translates such a constant into the processor designation. Otherwise it will be shown
"Unknown processor." Why couldn't I call CPUID? (Because there was still PowerPC).
«About this Mac». Again, clean water cosmetics.
There is information from vit9696
https://github.com/acidanthera/EfiPkg/blob/master/Include/IndustryStandard/AppleSmBios.h
The C-state group has now moved back to the ACPI section, ACPI-
>SSDT.
Here are the following keys. Now excluded!
<key>C2</key>
<true/>
For modern computers put false.
<key>C4</key>
<true/>
According to the specification, either C3 or C4.
<key>C6</key>
<true/>
C6 is known only on mobile computers, however, you can try and turn on the desktop. On
Evie and Hazlewell put true.
81
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
I note that with this C-States people often stingat bad sound/graphics/sleep. Be careful, or
exclude them altogether.
<key>Latency</key>
<integer>250</integer>
This is a delay in turning on the C3 state. Critical value of 0x3E8-1000. Less - the speedstep is
turned on, more - is not turned on. On the nativists always 0x03E9, that is, the speedstep does
not work. In haqas, we have to choose what we want to be like, to be like a nativnik, or to turn
on power management.
McPro5.1 q 17
McPro6.1 q 67
AiMac13.2
<key>SavingMode</key>
<integer>7</integer>
Another interesting parameter for speedstep management.
0 - maximum performance of 15 -
maximum energy saving.
I have an iMac12 model with the lasttwo-key states.
<key>QEMU</key>
<true/>
When testing Clover in the virtual machine, I found that it was improperly emulated by the
Intel processor. As a temporary measure, this key is made, however, it fixes not everything.
<key>TurboDisable</key>
<true/>
Useful for laptops so they don't overheat.
<key>HWPEnable</key>
<true/>
Since the 3879 audit, Intel Speed Shift technology has been introduced for Skylake processors. The
author of goodwin_c. If true, then the register MSR 0x770 writes 1. One trouble, it is not yet clear
what to do with it. And then wake up, the value of MSR 0x7 70 will drop to 0. And
Clover is no longer able to put it back.
It is more correct to manage this with a cupcake, which after awakening will expose the unit
https://github.com/headkaze/HWPEnable
<key>HWPValue</key>
<string>0x30002a01</string>
This value was the most appropriate. This value will be recorded in the MSR 0x774 register. Only
if MSR 0x770 costs in 1. Otherwise, this register is not available.
<key>TDP</key>
<integer>95</integer>
82
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
This is Thermal Design Power, counted in p-states when generating CPU Power Management
tables.
Graphics
This set of settings serves to inject the properties of the graphics card, as Natit.kext does.
There are a lot of parameters that are actually injected, but these are mostly constants, some are
computed, some are set in the inner table, and the tolis a very separate parameter.
<key>GraphicsInjector</key>
<true/>
The actual inclusion of this injection function. By the way, by default it is turned on, because the
injection should work with pure confit - a condition of the system's launch. Turning off thein-the-
head is worth it in case you know the best way.
For some modern cards, like the Nvidia 6h or the Radeon 6hh, the default injection is off because
the native factory works. Defective, but you can enter the desktop.
In the 1921 audit, this option is out of date, but it issupported, now the graphics cards are
injected separately, by vendors, because modern computers almost always have a built-in
Intel, and to include its injection sometimes to no avail.
<key>Inject</key>
<dict>
<key>Intel</key>
<false/>
<key>ATI</key>
<true/>
<key>NVidia</key>
<false/>
</dict>
<key>VRAM</key>
<integer>1024</integer>
The volume of video memory in MB. In fact, it is automatically determined, but if you write the
correct value - no one will suffer. However,I don't remember a single case that this setting helped
someone in some way.
<key>LoadVBios</key>
<true/>
Download a videobiosis from a file that should be in an EFI/CLOVER/OEM/xxx/ROM or
EFI/CLOVER/ROM file and have the file name vendor_device.rom, such as 1002_68d8.rom. This
sometimes makes sense if you usea patched video biography 10de_0f00_1458_3544.rom. He
needs it to test different graphics cards on the same computer.
Thereare also problems that the video card does not show the system its video bios, although the
system requires, for example, in the case of mobile radons.
83
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
More clarification. It turns out that the BIOS stitched in the ROM card does not coincide with
the fact thatthe former is at 0xc0000 - the shadow of the rum.
Shorter. For mobile radons put Yes, although there is no file, for the rest of the cards No.
And now new times have come. For computers with UEFI-only BIOS, there is no VideoBios on the
Legasi address. We put in the file and wait for new solutions. Or... And that's how it works?
<key>DualLink</key>
<integer>0</integer>
The default is 1, but for some older configurations, this option is 1, leading to screen readers.
It helps the installation in 0, as in the example.
<key>BootDisplay</key>
<integer>1</integer>
It indicates which display is the main one.
<key>PatchVBios</key>
<true/>
Clover puts a correction inthe shadow of VideoBios at 0xC0000 to support that video mode,
which is the maximum for a connected monitor. Clover will prescribe it as the first fashion
andwill allow you to use it.
There have been cases where the inclusion of this patch has caused panic, a black screen when
trying to load. For the first attempt, turn this option off.
Either the patch uses the value from the config.plist file
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>ScreenResolution</key>
<string>1440x900</string>
If the automation is wrong, you can prescribe the VideoBios patch manually, according to the
standard Find/Replace algorithm.
<key>PatchVBiosBytes</key>
<array>
<dict>
<key>Find</key>
<data>gAeoAqAF</data>
<key>Replace</key>
<data>gAeoAjgE</data>
</dict>
</array>
You can make several patches in one BIOS 0.1.2... For example, success with Nvidia came with
four patches.
This example from videobios ATIRadeon HD6670, replacing the fashion 1920x1440
with a more acceptable 1920x1080.

Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>EDID</key>
<dict>
In this dictionary, such paragraphs
<key>Inject</key>
<true/>
1. There are monitors without DDC, such as laptop panels.
2. There are options when DDC is available, but Apple drivers don't see it.
On the second option, we put simply Inject'yes, and Clover himself will extract EDID , and will slip
it to the drivers. The need for such action is noted in the theme of mobileradeons.
<key>Custom</key>
<data>AP///////wAyDADfAAAAAAASAQOAIRV4CunVmVlTjigm
UFQAAAABAQEBAQEBAQEBAQEBAQEB3iGgcFCEHzAgIFYAS88QAAAY3iGgcFCEHzAgIFYAS88QAAAAA
AAA/
gBXNjU3RwAxNTRXUDEKAAAA/gAjMz1IZYSq/wIBCiAgAJo=</data>
By the way, artificially slipped EDID will also be used for theauto-omatic patch of videobios.
Where to get EDID?
I put EDID from Della Inspiron in my sample of the config-plista. The 1440x900.
Another option for EDIDA is to use the ViewSonic EDID Editor program (version 3.1.5), which,
whenyouwish, easily port to OS AW_EDID_Editor X.
There is also information that Apple drivers arechecking the manufacturer, so a patch was invented
to automatically extract EDID to correct Apple.
85
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>ProductID</key>
<string>0x9221</string>
<key>VendorID</key>
<string>0x1006</string>
I can't say that it helped anyone in any way.
New keys
<key>HorizontalSyncPulseWidth</key>
<string>0x11</string>
There is such a parameter in the EDID specification, written in bytes 63 and 65 in the Detailed
Timing section.
<key>VideoInputSignal</key>
<string>0x80</string>
The second parameter is from the same hackers. This 0x14 byte in EDID determines the properties
of the connector. bit 7 - analog q0 or digital.
6 - 1 bits are defined only for analog signals.
Bit 0 for digital means that the signal is compatible with vesa DFP 1. x
<key>VideoPorts</key>
<integer>2</integer>
Number of video shows on the map, including TVO and/or HDMI. The frame chosen from the
Apple list may not match our real map. It affects the number of injectable connectors. It can help
to fightwith imaginary monitors.
<key>FBName</key>
<string>Makaka</string>
This option is specific to ati Radeon, which has three dozen different frameworks without any
regularity to whom what. Clover automatically selects the most appropriate name from the table on
most known cards. However, others usethe exact same card to challenge, they need a different
name.
But don't write this macaque! Specially prescribed for the absurd - no, still copy in his config!
There is this idea that the difference in these frames is the set of connectors, and since you are
already going to patch them, there is no difference that you will take as a basis. Unless the
frame shouldmatchthe family of video cards. For example, Wormy will not work with Radeon
6670.
<key>RadeonDeInit</key>
<true/>
This key works with ATI/AMD Radeon 6xxx and above. Or maybe 5xxx, didn't see any reviews. It
corrects the contents of the GPU registers so that the card becomes properly initiated, and the
MacOSX drivers work with it as they should.
86
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>NVCAP</key>
<string>04000000000003000C0000000000000A00000000</string>
This is the option for NVidia graphics cards, configuring the types and destinations of videoports.
There are 40 hexath numbers in capital letters in this line. The theory is absent, there is an
empiricist, and even with contradictory results. There is such a tableand the head, but its
correctness is disputed.
The first byte is always 04 (in McBook 05!). The second byte of the LID'01 for laptops.
There are other ways to calculate the correct value of this line on the forums. And Clover himself is
trying to calculate from BIOS.
87
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>display-cfg</key>
<string>03010300FFFF0001</string>
This is also a NVidia-only option. See the details in the
http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/215236-nvidia-injection/
However, the information given there
is debat http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=370 able. Just don't
specify this option at all, let Clover figure it out.
<key>NvidiaGeneric</key>
<true/>
If it's a rub instead of the name Gigabyte Geforce 7300LE
the name NVIDIA Geforce 7300LE will be used
I don't know why. Maybe someone needs real data, and someone looks like a nativist.
<key>NvidiaSingle</key>
<false/>
From the same series of incomprehensible patches. If it is worth the tru, then to inject only
the first card, the second is not.
<key>NvidiaNoEFI</key>
<false/>
Adds NVDA,noEFI property to Nvidia's injection
Explanations from FredWst http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/306156-clover-bugissue-
report-and-patch/page-107?p/2443062/entry2443062
Claims to be without this on-screen artecfax on his GT640.
<key>ig-platform-id</key>
<string>0x01620005</string>
This option is necessary to run the Intel HDxxxx graphics card, the dispute about specific
values has not led to a single rule, so the option is simply rendered in the config - pick up. By
the way, Clover himself will offer some meaning.
Now I have the result. Moy Skylake launched only with the option 0x193b0000, it corresponds to
the configuration in which there is an HDMI output like mine.
KernelAndKextPatches
This group of options for implementing binary patches on the fly. It should be noted that this
is only feasible ifthe download is done through kernelcache or through ForceKextsToLoad. If the
kext is not downloaded and is not present in the kesh, then these fixes do not work.
<key>Debug</key>
<true/>
If you want to watch the progress, how the cupcake patch is going. Actually, it's a key for
developers.
<key>KernelCpu</key>
<true/>
88
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Preventsn core anika on unsupported CPU, in particular Yonah, Atom, Haswell for older
systems.
You need to understand that there are other algorithms in the core that will work incorrectly with
unsupported CPU, so don't expect this patchto have all your problems.
<key>FakeCPUID</key>
<string>0x010676</string>
This patch, introduced with Audit 2748, serves to replace KernelCpu. It doesn't just block the core's
panic, it replaces the processor ID so that all calls respond as supported. In particular, it also affects the
AppleIntelCPUPowerManagement.kext cupcake. Inthe first example, he substitutes the Penrin
PROCESSOR ID, which is supported by all OSX versions from 10.5 to 10.14, where it came to an end.
<key>AppleIntelCPUPM</key>
<true/>
It turns out that BIOS on the motherboards of ASUS (which once us ASUS northotics mood?)
writes in the MSR register 0xE2 bit 14, and the register becomes ReadOnly, but it is used in the
AppleIntelCPUPowerManagementcupcake, and is used on the record.
Bet Yes if at the start of the system you have a panic on this cupcake. (Yes, the E2 register has a
WriteOnce property, i.e. you can only write it down once before you reboot). It's relevant
forSandy and above. They say it's good for Windowes, as well.
<key>AppleRTC</key>
<true/>
OsX's operating system somehow doesn't work as well with CMOS as it is provided by BIOS, as a
result when waking up from sleep or rebooting there is a reset of CMOS.
However, in some cases, this paschdoesnot help. Then you can correct the AppleRTC
cupcake itself, which is what is being done here. It's out of date! vit9696 investigated the
problem, and corrected Clover's operations with RTC, now the recommended value of the
key is zlt;false/qgt; as it affects hibernation. Although, controversially, I still have the
hibernation key in NVRAM.
<key>KernelLapic</key>
<false/>
There's a problem with lapic on NR laptops, which is solved by running with cpus 1, or now with
this patch, the problem and solution has been around for a long time, since the days of Chameleon,
but until the new developers get to the laptops of NR to figure out more seriously what the trick is.
<key>KernelPM</key>
<false/>
It turns out, starting with the system 10.9es t some control of CPUPM laid right in the core. This patch
prevents the panic of the nucleus, for those cases when 0xE2 is embedded in the BIOS.
89
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>KernelXCPM</key>
<false/>
XCPM support for IvyBridge processors has been discontinued in the 10.12 system. It's okay, you
can go the Apple way, well, who is used to XCPM, can put this key in the zlt'true/qgt."
<key>DellSMBIOSPatch</key>
<true/>
It is noticed that on Dell laptops with the processof Rum Skylake and above, the UEFI BIOS itself
spoils our ready-made SMBIOS. It is not clear why, but it must be fought.
<key>KextsToPatch</key>
<array>
In addition to the specificpatches, you can make a patch of any other muxte, the principle is simple:
16 rich line what to look for, and a line on what to replace.
Sample: VoodooHDA patch forthe Headphones name amena on Telephones.
This method has been successfully used to enable Trim support for SSD
http://www.applelife.ru/threads/clover.32052/page-539#post-310105
Here's another very useful patch: the fight against yellow icons and a non-working DVD
player (which doesn't work for external drives):
Original theme http://www.applelife.com.au/threads/change-external-on-internal.38111/
<dict>
<key>Name</key>
<string>AppleAHCIPort</string>
<key>Find</key>
<data>RXh0ZXJuYWw=</data>
<key>Replace</key>
<data>SW50ZXJuYWw=</data>
</dict>
To choose a MacPro4.1 or 5.1 model without having a memory with the ESS. AppleTyMCEDriver
patch Spotted and simpler method -nehalem_error_disable disables the AppleTyMCEDriver Thanks to AkimoA.
One of the most useful patches is lifting the limit on the number of ports in the USB3 controller.
90
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
The total amount in Apple's terms should not exceed 15 ports. I illustrate the result on my
computer
That is, having counted 14 HS ports (usb2), it took only one SS port (usb3), while on the specking
chipsthat of 10.
Patch next (depending on the version of the system)
<dict>
<key>Find</key>
<data>g32UDw+DlwQ=</data>
<key>Comment</key>
<string>USB 3.0 limit High Sierra 10.13.4</string>
<key>Disabled</key>
<false/>
<key>MatchOS</key>
<string>10.13</string>
<key>Name</key>
<string>com.apple.driver.usb.AppleUSBXHCI</string>
<key>Replace</key>
<data>g32UGA+DlwQ=</data>
</dict>
The sample, by the way, illustrates the additional keys of the patch:
<key>Disabled</key>
<true/>
You can disable the dubious keys in the confit to include them in Clover's interface.
<key>Comment</key>
<string>USB 3.0 limit High Sierra 10.13.4</string>
The comment is also visible in Clover's interface, but does not have an effect on the system.
<key>MatchOS</key>
<string>10.13</string>
It often happens that this patch only applies to a specific version of the system, and another version
needs a different patch. We write both, and we show the version, including the full 10.13.5 or
shortened, as in the example. However, you are unlikely to have two systems 10.13.2 and 10.13.4,
so in the full version there is no special sense, just do not forget to update the patches along with the
system update.
