137
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<integer>0</integer>
</dict>
This PLimitDict key has already been mentioned in the P-states generation. Again, this is the
CPU's maximum speed limit. 0 - the speed is maximum, 1- one step below the maximum. If this
key is not present, the processor will get stuck at a minimum frequency.
CStateDict
<key>CStateDict</key>
<dict>
<key>MacBook4,1</key>
<string>CSD3</string>
<key>CSD3</key>
<dict>
<key>C6</key>
<dict>
<key>enable</key>
<true/>
Practice shows that this section is better to remove everything, so that power management
works on PState, and not on CState. Although, who like, maybe this option is worth working
on.
Symptom - the processor stands at the maximum frequency, does not fall. Once the section is
removed, the frequency begins to vary.
With Skylake processors there is a new technique by the Management of Processor
Frequency, in their name called SpeedShift.
In the CPU section we prescribe two keys (inventor - goodwin_c)
<key>CPU</key>
<dict>
<key>HWPEnable</key>
<true/>
<key>HWPValue</key>
<string>0x30002a01</string>
The first key puts 1 in the REGISTER MSR 0x770.
The second key writes a set value in the MSR 0x774 register.
Sleep problem
What's the problem with sleep? When all of the above is done, the computer will go to bed
and wake up like an obedient child. The most important thing needed for this, Clover has already
done: adjusted FADT and FACS. It remains only to correct the DDDT, to get withthe peddze, to
use only good cupcakes, and you will be happy.
Good sleep can be prevented by any device, including an unsized PCI device, or a partially
wound-up device. For example, AppleHDA. Sleep is categorically hindered by NullCPUPM.kext.
You maynot need a peddite, but you have to do a UNT patch to run your native AppleCPUPM, and
zero wasn't needed.
In DDDT,a group of methods _GPE with notifications on each device that needs to be awakened
after sleep.
There was also a sleep problem when UEFI downloaded to the 10.8 system.
The problem was solved in the audit of 1942. OsxAptioFixDxe driver change: Sleep/awakening
works even at 10.8, even with CsmVideoDxe. Now it's a pick Of ProtectMemoryRegions.
The next trick for UEFI download
138
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
<key>ACPI</key>
<dict>
<key>HaltEnabler</key>
<true/>
This corrects the state of the chipset, incorrectly initiated by UEFI-bios. For the boot Legasi
CloverEFI does everything correctly, there was no such problem. Symptoms - does not go to sleep,
the screen goes out, and the fans do not.
And one more trick.
That's without the tick "Start up automatically..." I couldn't get a wake-up call after sleep.
Hibernet
It is also called deep sleep, and in general more like a clinical death. But it keeps
its state in the sleepimage file, and just turns off the computer so that then, when turned on, it
just regained its condition and woke up.
Once upon a time with Chameleon Hibernet worked, but only until version 10.7.2
(sort), then dueto some changes in the system, this technique stopped working.
• Download either CloverEFI (legacy) or InsydeEFI or Phoenix 2.3.1. In the current audit
of 2915, there is a driver OsxAptioFix2Drv, which allows you to have a hibernet with
AMI UEFI on the system 10.9.1. But the system 10.7.5 ingeneral does notload with this
option.
• The system is either 10.7.5 or 10.9.1. Other systems don't wake up yet.
139
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
• Fashion 21 or better, 29 or even 57, although Apple insists on 25.
sudo pmset -a hibernatemode 29
Starting with Captain tato put 29 is impossible.
- copy/Library/Preferences/com.apple.PowerManagement.511CE201-1000-4000-9999-
120361221216.plist on desktop. There are several such files, choose the one that
corresponds to UUID in Information About The System. Redact this file to bring in 29
<key>Hibernate Mode</key>
<integer>29</integer>
And copy the edited file with the terminal back
sudo cp ~/Desktop/ com.apple.PowerManagement.511CE201-1000-4000-9999- 120361221216.plist /Library/Preferences/
After that, you need to reboot, only then the change will take effect.
• If you have a real, iron NVRAM, you can make fashion 25. And then in the confit
we prescribe
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>StrictHibernate</key>
<true/>
• For the 10.13 system and above, you need to turn on
<key>RtcHibernateAware</key>
<true/>
because the encryption key can be spelled out in CMOS, and because Clover has to form
additional NVRAM variables. (You still have to think about the latter.
Here's how it works:
1. We put fashion 29 (or 25) if not yet exhibited.
2. Send your computer to sleep either through the menu, or close the lid, or press the power
button if it's set up.
3. To wake up, just turn it on as usual.
(hibernated)
140
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Whereas other systems don't. When you click on this icon, the system is loaded out of them, a
few seconds, the progress is visible at the bottom, and the system is turned on.
It should be noted that if the file system of the volume subjectedto modifications after hibernet, for
example from the system loaded from the second section, there will be a serious risk of damage to
the file system, because in the sleeping system there is a cache with a different structure.
You can undo the awakening from the image by clicking on the space on this icon and selecting
"Cancel hibernation."
If the system continues tobelieve that it is necessary to wake up, it will have to be prescribed in the
config:
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>NeverHibernate</key>
<true/>
How to use
First acquaintance
First, download to Clover's GUI and try, first, to live here, to press different keys, to move the
mouse.
The top row of buttons is a supposed operating system that can be
141
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Download. In this picture there are two, Lion and Windows, which can be seen from the pictures.
/System/Library/CoreServices/boot.efi. For Windowes, in this case,
/EFI/microsoft/boot/bootmgfw.efi
The bottom row of buttons includes additional features: Shell, Options menu, loader and
environment information, restart and exit from Clover. Where to go? Back to the EFI environment,
in UEFI BIOS or in CloverEFI withresponsibly.
Very useful for initial dating to click F1 (who would have thought?!). If the confit indicates
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>Language</key>
<string>ru:0</string>
then and help will be in Russian language
A command line is something like a DOS, with the ability to copy and delete files. As for
what - it goes beyond the scope of this book. This is Shell.efi with its help.
The Options menu allows you to change some settings that will affect the process of downloading
the system.
Some of them are set in the config.plist file, but it could well have turned out that it was written
incorrectly, and in order not to edit this file while, the settings can be changed already in the time of the
neglected Clover.
142
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
What exactly to change and for what, it depends on the task, what exactly you need to get.
Several special downloads can be obtained by clicking the space on the loader icon. (once
again, ENTER - system download, SPACE - login to the additional download menu).
In particular, only here you can prevent the exit from the Hibernet, if it is undesirable.
Why is Clover running so slowly?
Some can't even wait for the launch to report that Clover isn't working.
Let's take a closer look at this issue.
1. On display debug.log.
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>Debug</key>
<true/>
Yes, this is very valuable information to find out what doesn't work and why. But keep in mind that
this is very slowing down the launch. If Clover is installed on the USB (for a trial, so to speak,
we do not believe that Clover is even able to work?!), then the launch with a debagon can last
143
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Ten minutes. Yes, it's real. This is because the debage log opens, closes and is rewritten on a
flash drive on each line. This is to ensure that you get information about the success of
thelaunch even with a forced cut, so if you went to the debug, wait! or for the first attempt to
put a zlt'false/qgt;.
2. There are too many drives, sections and files on them.
Clover to compile the launch menu, dothe wives scan all the discs, all the sections, and all the files on
them to find out what systems you can offer to run.
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>Scan</key>
<dict>
<key>Entries</key>
<false/>
<key>Legacy</key>
<false/>
<key>Tool</key>
<false/>
</dict>
and make the menu by hand
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>Custom</key>
<dict>
<key>Entries</key>
<array>
<dict>
However, it requires some mental effort to understand what to write there. Or leave to scan the
loaders for a while to load somewhere.
<key>Scan</key>
<dict>
<key>Entries</key>
<true/>
3. Huge Windows or Linux section, and not even onein.
The Windowes section is scanned if the driver's NTFS is available. And in this section, usually a
million files, and among them we are going to look for bootmgr.efi.
I would recommend installing Windows so that this file is on the EFI section and the NTFS.efi
driver should be removed altogether, and thus not to scan the Vindows sections.
It's the same with the Linux section and the VBoxExt2.efi driver.
4. Too many drivers in the folder /EFI/CLOVER/drivers/
I foresee a situation where people start producing their own drivers of this type, and there will be
those willing to try them. At this point, think about whether you need an extra keyboard driver,
mouse, LowMemoryFix... The fact is that if you runout of ESS, then reading all these files can take
time.
5. Unsupportedmouse.
Unfortunately, not all mice are supported by the EFI driver that we have. A bad mouse can behave
on the screen incorrectly, or give hard brakes.
Ban her for inspection, or even forever, if it's wrong
<key>Mouse</key>
<dict>
<key>Enabled</key>
<false/>
<key>Speed</key>
<integer>0</integer>
</dict>
6. Slow driver HFS.
Complete with the official Clover is a VboxHFS.efi driver, which is licensed clean and understands
links, but works slower than Apple's HFSplus.efi. Download where-
144
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
someday this unofficial but fast driver, and put it in the folder
/EFI/CLOVER/drivers/UEFI/. This also applies to legasi.. Women/BIOS/)downloads.
7. Chosen monstrously beautiful theme design.
The richer the theme is with colors and animations, the longer it is loaded. Youtake the built-in
theme, it's the fastest
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>Theme</key>
<string>embedded</string>
8. Use the newest Clover.
Whatever the good advisers whispered, the new version is better than the old version, and it corrects
bugs, in particular,clover's hang-ups.
The inscriptions are crooked because a good font has not yet been downloaded, and this has caused
a lot of unflattering responses "How to remove the inscriptions on the screen?". Put timeout 0, and
the inscriptions will not be.
Or so
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>NoEarlyProgress</key>
<true/>
Next, let's look at some techniques, special patches, and methods of work, collected on the
principle of reverse vocabulary. There is a problem → here is the solution.
Analyzing Debug.log/Preboot.log
What for? Clover will give you information about the iron that you won't see from the
characterto the site, and will also talk about how he copes with configuration before you run the
system.
How to get it? I will say at once that it is the same thing, with a difference in success and
speed. To get a preboot.log, go to Clover's shell (GUI) and press the F2. Preboot file.log will be
stored in clover EFI/CLOVER/misc/File/.
145
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
ends with the phrase Enter GUI, which is logical. However, if you download the system, the file
will end at the start of the system itself, that isall that you can.
If Clover is hanging, it will help debug.log. To get it, put in a confit
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>Debug</key>
<true/>
In this case, the file is created line-by-line, and you are guaranteed to find a stop in it. Example:
222:890 0:001 DefaultIndex=-1 and MainMenu.EntryCount=7 222:892
0:001 SetScreenResolution: 1366x768 - already set 0:100 0:100
MemLog inited, TSC freq: 2591578780
0:100 0:000 CPU was calibrated with ACPI PM Timer
Here we see that after the message about the change of screen resolution began a new log.
Let's look now at what we see in the log.
MemLog inited, TSC freq: 2591583140
Here's the initial clock speed of the processor. By standard, the processor starts with one core at
maximum non-turbo frequency. If you don't, hit the bells urgently! It won't work. Such situations
are rare, and each timewe are individually taken with special amendments ofClover. Round it
will only be in utilities that are rounding for easy display.
Now is 14.7.2019, 8:47:7 (GMT)
The date and time of the greenwich launch. In Moscow, the local time will be 3. We distinguish
the old log from the new one.
0:100 0:000 Starting Clover revision: 5120 (master, commit dddceaae3) on American Megatrends EFI
Here and below we will find out which version of Clover used the user, as well as he has AEFI
download, as in this case, or legasi (would be Clover EFI).
=== [ Get Smbios ] ====
Then there is the deciphering of memory modules, as they were recognized by BIOS. Usually
correct, so put in the confit
<key>SMBIOS</key>
<dict>
<key>Trust</key>
<true/>
And if you don't like the values, then false. Clover will then determine himself by reading
SPD or XMP. In SMBIOS values are also taken from reading SPD, by BIOS algorithms.
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>XMPDetection</key>
<string>-1</string>
See the configuration chapter.
Running on: 'Latitude E6430' with board '0H3MT5'
And this is the information that your computer is called.
=== [ GetCPUProperties ] ====
Here's information about the processor, and CPUID, and its own name
BrandString = Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3320M CPU @ 2.60GHz
146
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
And other important characteristics.
MSR 0xE2 before patch 1E008404
See the eight? It's a spleton, a terrible sin for Mac. If possible, re-ish the BIOS to the unlocked. If
not, it is quite possible to live by putting patches
<key>KernelAndKextPatches</key>
<dict>
<key>KernelPm</key>
<true/>
<key>AppleIntelCPUPM</key>
<true/>
Clover is supposed to do it with a machine gun, but it's better if you do it manually.
Turbo: 31/31/31/33
These numbers mean that 3300MHz is achievable at one core, on two cores and more than 3100.
Since all the kernels are included in the Mac, there is noneed to make a claim that the processor in
the poppy does not accelerate to the maximum possible frequency of 3300.
I do, however, have another line
The CPU not supported turbo
This is most likely the bios banned use of turbo frequencies. We need to look at the SETTINGS
of the BIOS.

addresses and DeviceID/VendorID. It helps a lot to find out if you can find a driver under this
device

some devices are also commented on.

from the specifications of PCI.

here's another moment, from someone else's lair.

0:128 0:027 EFI\CLOVER\#.plist not loaded with name from LoadOptions: Not Found 0:143 0:015
EFI\CLOVER\config.plist loaded: Success
This Clover feature is practically not used by anyone. The thing is that in BIOS there is a place
where to usethe name of the file config.plist, and thus you can choose directly in THE LIMS to
choose with which confit to load Clover.
Below in the log there is another list
0:346 0:003 === [ Found config plists ] ===============================

It's for Clover's menu to swap the config from there. But the Boot, GUI and
KernelAndKextPatches sections will not change. It's late!

Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
4:481 0:002 === [ GetMacAddress ] =====================================
4:561 0:080 MAC address of LAN #0= D4:BE:D9:6C:86:CD:
Clover can read the MAC address of almost any network card. We use this information to put our
value on the ROM variable. On some UEFI BIOS it doesn't work, looking for other ways.
=== [ ScanSPD ] ====
Check themodules if we don't trust BIOS.
=== [ GetAcpiTablesList ] ====
A list of ACPI tables found in BIOS. It'll be useful if you want to throw away some (drop)
- [06]: SSDT CpuPm len=2850
There's also an ID and a 2850 length. You can drop both, depending on the uniqueness.
=== [ GetUserSettings ] ===
some selective information, what exactly is exhibited in the confit, is especially useful for reading
other people's lairs.
=== [ ScanVolumes ] ===
A list of volumes with their addresses and UUID. It's either a section or a whole disk.
Useful to see when "Clover can't see my section!".
=== [ InitTheme ] ====
Then there is information about the successful creation of a graphical interface with the chosen
theme. I, for example,I'm a v-yu
OSicon os_mav not parsed
that is, in my chosen theme there is no icon of Mavericks, will be used simply icon Mac.
Here's also information about the starting sound, which depends on the theme.
6:511 0:002 === [ Dump SMC keys from NVRAM ] ==========================
6:570 0:059 found AppleSMC protocol
6:584 0:014 Registered 17 SMC keys
In most cases, SMC keys do not play a role at the start. Provided by SMChelper.efi driver
and Clover's infrastructure. (there is still a variant of VirtualSMC with its Infrastructure).
You don't want a system to install, but... Who knows!
=== [ ScanLoader ] ===
And here is a list of what can be downloaded from. As well as information, if any system is in
a state of hibernation.
=== [ GetEfiBootDeviceFromNvram ] ====
The success of this operation depends on whether Clover's autostart will be on a timeout.
We look at the instructions with the appropriate chapter.
Success looks like this
Boot redirected to Entry 3. 'Boot macOS from HighHD'
That is, I have a timeout loaded system from the disk HighHD.
=== [ StartLoader ] ===
Start loading the system
GetOSVersion: 10.13.6 (17G7024)
On to see about the download of what system the user says.

Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Then there is the information, what exactly Clover produces before downloading the chosen system,
what patches, what properties are generated, what cupcakes are loaded, and the last line unlockusb2.0, if
necessary.
USB EHCI Ownership for device 1E26 value=1000001
In version 5120, the log continues with values from kernel patch procedures and muxets. It's for
developers.
Launch OSX on unsupported iron
Actually, the whole book is about THIS. I'll talk here in part, starting from the question.
Unsupported BIOS. I'd love to. It is about Hakintoshi that we are talking about. It's
the DMI data that contains the manufacturer's name (should be Apple inc.), the model and the
serial number, the numbers and letters in which the numbers are not random, they mean
something, in particular the model and the production date.
However, it is recommended to generate your serials, and may take a model different from the
model by default.
Unsupportedprocessor. Yes, different versions of MACOs support different CPU sets, and
your processor may not be supported.
Here's a table on the old systems:
1
1
and so on
That is, Yonah and XeonMP support is discontinued; the newer processor the newer the system is
required; The atom was never maintained, although the seemingly ordinary Intel processor. The
plate is out of date, look at the sources of XNU. Skylake, for example, is supported at 10.11.6 and
above.
CPU name
10.9.
5

150
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
When you run the system on an unsupported processor, you get a core panic. To prevent it is
a patch KernelCpu'true. It simply replaces the panic call on an empty operator, and everything
continues to work. In Clover's new revisions, I made a Patch FakeCPUID'0x010676. And closeto
your processor (about the same generation, such as Atom should be replaced by Penrin, or even
Conroy get_cpu_info).
Example:
<key>KernelAndKextPatches</key>
<dict>
<key>FakeCPUID</key>
<string>0x010676</string>
Unsupported video ofart.
Intel. Supported: GMA950, X3100, HD3000, and above. Alas, no substitutions do not help. For
each option, there is a set of patches, and if the graphics card is different, then at best you will
have a picture, without the possibility of changing permission, and without any 3D effects.
Nvidia. 7300-7600 cards are only supported until the 10.7.5 system in 32-bit mode.
There are some questions to The Fermi 4/5 x cards. They should also be classifiedas partially
supported, and only up to the 10.11.6 system.
For systems 10.12 and above, only Kepler,the GK family,is running, and the GK familyneeds a
WEB driver that exists only until the 10.13.6 system. These are GTX 6xxx-7xxx cards, but not all
of them, among them there are also Fermi, then a bummer.
ATI/AMD.The whole story.On systems 10.13 and above Radeon series 6000 and below do not
work.
Now here's another WhateverGreen from vit9696 - "driver of all video cards, just put the
latest version, as well as the latest version of Lila, and do not think about anything. In Clover, you
need to disable everything related to the graphics cards." But I don't play like that! Who doesn't
want to sort it out, please use.
Maps 5700 work only starting from Catalina.
151
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
The sound card. Professional cards usually have a driver for Mack.
HDA chipnet codex is supported by all with VoodooHDA cupcake. The native AppleHDA cupcake
does not support any of the codeces present on the market. Once upon a time there was ALC885,
but now itdoes notcome. But hackers have developed a technique of AppleHDA patch so that it
supports almost any desired realtec chip (i.e. ALCxxx). Clover helps to correct DSDT under this
muffin, and offers ways to patch the cupcake on the fly. What exactly to patch and how to read on
the forums. HDMI Audio works with KDDT patches in Clover, however, does not work with
some AMD cards. But in the systems of 10.13, there is a new driver AppleGFXHDA.kext, study!
Network map. First, Apple drivers are underthe pull of a number of chips. In some
cases, it is enough to make FakeID for the card, so that it was included in the list of supported by
native avers,but in most cases you need aseparate cupcake.
WiFi. . . and here everything is very sad. Intel doesn't have any. Clover can help with
FakeID, for example in my version of the Boadcom4315 spoof on supported 4312.
From 2020, a driver for some Intel WiFi cards has appeared on the network. There are chances!
Block cupcake
Happened to me to install a Geenna.kext muffin in the SLE system folder. On the panic
screen, after the reboot, this cupcake is loaded first, and immediately panic. So what do we do
now? It needs to be removed, but there is no other system on this computer yet. For thispurpose,
Clover introduced an additional feature: in Options Menu in the third line enter Block kext:
Geenna and quietly download the system in single user mode (a space on the system icon).
fsck -fy mount -
uw /
rm -r -v /S*/L*/Ex*/Geenna.kext reboot
The rebut is necessary here, otherwise the kernel will still load this cupcake with the next step, and
again
there will be panic.
The new Clover has a new technique: put all our cupcakes in the folder EFI/CLOVER/kexts/Other.
And in clover Details menu (space) we'll find a spoof to lock/unlock cupcakes.
152
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Starting with the 5052 audit, it was possible to store the cupcakes in the Off folder and plug them
into the same menu as needed
The cupcakes in the Other folder are connected by default and off in the Off folder, but are visible to
Clover to connect.
153
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Slot name (AAPL, slot-name)
It's mostly cosmetics, although there are claims that it will obligeyou to eat in some cases.
Where does the system get the slot name from? In the old way, it was tried to inject through the
_DSM property "AAPL, slot-name", but this is completely wrong method for treats the consequence
instead of the cause. This property is exhibited by The AppleSMBIOS system cupcakeon the basis
of the ACPI of the _SUN properties and D _SUN MI tables.
See the chapter about filling the confiscat,sing SMBIOS-'gt;Slots
HDMI sound
Everything you need for AppleHDA investigated Toleda, but not everyone will want to
search for his explanation in English. I made patches of DSDT, with his participation, to get as close
to his result as possible.
Fundamentally, there are twoanta HDMI devices.
1. On the external graphics card OF ATI or NVidia. In the system it is listed as a sound device of the
class HDA 0x0403, and is served by the same sound driver.
2. Intel's built-in map has an HDMI connector, but there is no device, the sound from the chipset
HDA is used.
<key>Devices</key>
<dict>
<key>UseIntelHDMI</key>
<true/>
At the same time, the sound from ATI or NVidia will become "onboard-2."
For DSDT, the necessary fixes: FixDisplay_0100, FixHDA_8000, AddHDMI_8000000
3. The option is that the intro is only used for the I'SV. Then (iMac18.3)
Inthe buildingHDEF has a property No-hda-gfx
There's nothing in igPU (intro)
In GFX0 (which Radeon) is hda-gfx"onboard-1" and in
HDAU it is the same.
Automatically this Clover does not yet, use the array Of Properties.
I note that all these additional productsare only needed for AppleHDA.
The start-up sound of the computer
This is the invention of Goldfish64. He wrote an EFI driver for HDA sound, and made
utilities to customize the sound, testing and fabrication of the sound codec dump.
https://github.com/Goldfish64/AudioPkg
But he inserted the sound at the time of the boot.efi launch, intercepting his call with the loader. I'm
interested in making sure it works not just with Clover, but with any EFI loaderwithout touching
his internalcodes.
154
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
not lost, and that in the future it can be improved without asking the author, who may
disappear, not today, so tomorrow.
So, to work the sound you need:
1. Use Clover Audit 4871. Worked in past audits, but in bugs.
2. Put the AudioDxe.efi driver in the EFI/CLOVER/drivers/bios or drivers/UEFI folder
accordingly. Or both. This driver, supplied with Clover, is already different from the author's
original, not yet in principle, but I would recommend exactly its version.
3. Put sound files with sound.wav names and sound_night.wav in the themes you use.wav
sound_night.wav. 16bit little endian unsigned int, sampling frequency can be 8, 44.1, 48kHz,
on this depends on the sizeof the file. But the sound of this format was able to be packed directly
into Clover, and it is used for testy output.
4. Go to Clover's interface, Startup sound output→, and test which of the exits will play
In the first line, adjust the volume of sound from 0 to 100. Value 0 means that the sound will not
be played. That is, it is not that shouts with his mouth closed, and this is that attempts to meow are
not made. By the way, I don't know if the scale is linear or logarithmic.
The following lines are combined from the chip model and its output. If you have a few sonic toart,
as is often the case besides the built-in there is still HDMI, then you will all see in this list, with all
their outputs.
155
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Clover.SoundVolume, Clover.SoundDevice, Clover.SoundIndex. Here I have a contrast to a
goldfish, it keeps the settings in a private area with its UUID, which is impossible for emulating
memory, for Legasi-Clover. My settingsand will be visible from the system can be removed or
modified from the system, and the Clover prefix ensures there is no conflict with Apple's interests.
On the next reboot you will hear the sound before loading the Clover shell, but after the inscription ...
scan entries...
In the confit, these settings are not rendered, no matter what. In any case, you first have to
test, which means you already write down the settings in NVRAM. But there is one setting
left over from the test period. PlayAsync=true.
If the phalas, as long as the sound is playing, nothing works. It's like that on the abbot.
If it's a rub, the sound plays in the background without interfering with everything else. I putthe
lengths of the sound file and listened to the music.And only after a few loaded cupcakes she shut
up, probably it was VoodooHDA, which reinsitizedthe soundchip.
NVRAM, iMessage, multiboot
The question of using the NVRAM energy-independent memory system using GetVariable ()
and SetVariable () features was raisedin 2010
http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1504
Then I tried to implement work with him in Chameleon in my own brunch, but Ididn't
getanysupport.
In Chameleon, these features are there, but they are made very simply "return Unsupported"
so that the system running with Chameleon does not panic, and just did not respond to the call of
these functions. It worked for a while, for the removalof the StartupDisk panel.
What does NVRAM mean? If the system wants to keep a variable until the next reboot, it
writes it in NVRAM using SetVariable (...). We can alsosave our variables using the nvram utility:
sudo nvram MyVar=qu-qa-re-ku
after the restart, this variable should be known in the system with the help of the reading command
nvram MyVar
How does Clover keep this service healthy?
1. EmuVariableDxe features are used for the boot. This, of course, is not a real energy-
independent memory, because Legasi-Clover is designed for those computers where there
is no such memory at all, and there is no EFI of its own with the right
Sos
er the color of khaki. Version 5.1, audit
5128 kwa, 2021
Services. This driver writes variables simply in memory, but this memory is available for use by
MacOSX in its native interface. When the system is shut down, the rc.shutdown.local script is
called, which keeps all of this memory in the nvram.plist file at the root of thesystem disk. Clover at
the start finds this file, and brings all the variables from there again into RAM, emulating NVRAM.
2. For UEFI download we rely on our own Service VariableDxe, which is provided in OEM UEFI.
In the audit 2837 Dmazar corrected the work with this service, so that most users now have it
working in a native way. For those who do not have it, there is an EmuVariableUEFI emulation
driver that works similarly to the legosi driver, and also requires scripts and file nvram.plist. The
change is represented by the OsxAptioFix3Dxe driver, and vit9696 itself offers a more advanced
version of AptioMemoryFix, now includedin Clover's repository.
EmuVariable in both cases is not a full-fledged emulation., for example, panic persists.log,
simply because the script does not have time to work. Nor is the variable boot00082 needed for
hibernation, but this sroblem is bypassed in other ways.log.
i Message is Apple'sinstant messaging system. The mistake was understood
only in January, and thus the chameleons understood what was wrong, but they did not have a
NVRAM, without which it was all impossible. But also recommendations to include
appropriate values in the config.plist, for those who think a little more. You don't need to
use someone else's ROM, MLB and UUID, much less someone else's bank card. When all its own,
ROM has 12 digits, MLB has 17 cifp, UUID non-zero, and all this is unique, the account is tied to
the current account, which has money, iMessage will work.
Boot D is aservice that lets you choose which system we want to reboot, restart, and just
leave.
Bitin
g
153
154
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
The computer will do everything itself. So you can switch between 10.9 and 10.7, for example.
Remember the general rule: dynamic data takes precedence over static data.
Using multiple configurations
Possible problem: You have several systems, but these systems should be loaded with a
different set of patches spelled out in the confit, such as the definition of Radeon framework in the
new system is not the same as in the old one.
That's the config.
<key>GUI</key>
<dict>
<key>Custom</key>
<dict>
<key>Entries</key>
<array>
<dict>
<key>FullTitle</key>
<string>Lion special</string>
<key>Settings</key>
<string>config-special</string>
<key>Volume</key>
<string>EE9CCC69-EE7F-358F-B120-BCD07AD78282</string>
<key>SubEntries</key>
<array>
<dict>
settings</string>
<key>FullTitle</key>
<string>Boot Lion with own
<key>CommonSettings</key>
<false/>
</dict>
<dict>
settings</string>
<key>FullTitle</key>
<string>Boot Lion with common
<key>CommonSettings</key>
<true/>
</dict>
</array>
</dict>
<dict>
<key>FullTitle</key>
<string>Lion default</string>
<key>Volume</key>
<string>EE9CCC69-EE7F-358F-B120-BCD07AD78282</string>
<key>Type</key>
<string>OSX</string>
</dict>
</array>
</dict>
Here's what we've scheduled: We've assigned our own main menu items (Entries) withthenames
"Capitan special" and "Capitan default." The second item, as usual, allows you to ship the system
with a common config.plist, taking into account the changes made in Clover's Options menu.
The first item creates a new icon for the same system, but it will be loaded with another
config-special.plist confit, as indicated in the Settings key.
155
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
But that's not all. By clicking the space we will enter the launch menu, and then find our inputs, spelled
out as SubEntries
Compare the config with the pictures given to make it clear what's going on.
The second item in this menu means giving up a special confitto use generic.
It is clear that since the special config connects after Clover is launched, the sections of Boot and
GUI in it are no longer needed, they can only be in general confit. I, personally, used this
opportunity to test new confits to run the captain, having one proven worker.
156
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Now in Clover there is an opportunity to turn theconfigs right on the menu.
The limitation of this method is that the Boot section does not change. Nor does it change
KernelAndKextPatches. The new config will take effect after the main menu is available.
Here there is a bewilderment, and why even change toonftig, if not for KextPatches? Alas, it
doesn't work, the reason is somewhere deep in Clover's algorithms.
How to make boot.efi not too spamming on the screen?
Enter this menu
157
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
and write it down there. Other values may be available, vit9696
log'value,direction of withdrawal
1 — AppleLoggingConOutOrErrSet/AppleLoggingConOutOrErrPrint (classical ConOut or
StdErr on failure)
2 —AppleLoggingStdErrSet/AppleLoggingStdErrPrint (StdErr or serial?)
4 —AppleLoggingFileSet/AppleLoggingFilePrint (BOOTER. LOG/BOOTER. OLD file on
EFI partition)
debug=value
1 — enables print something to BOOTER. LOG (stripped code implies there may be a
crash) 2 — enables perf logging to /efi/debug-log in the device three
4 — enables timestamp printing for styled printf calls
level-value - error rate
kc-read-size-value - log size
For our purposes, it is enough log-0, which in Clover is done by default.
Faq
Chahundred asked Waughpros.
B. I want to try Clover, where to start?
A. Since reading this book.
It's a good place to be. It's weird to write this inside a book, but maybe these chavos will be out of its
pages.
Which clover version is best suited to my iron?
A. The last one. It's not even up for discussion.
It's a good place to be. Here's Bug-log on some revisions that have finally
been corrected: 3514: DDR4 support
3471: Global bug using va_args
3362: SAMBIOS bug when strings are duplicated in the original
3358: Corrected nuclei calculation for many Xeons 3336: corrected bug
with region fix
3333: new processors added
3259: Corel patch to ship cupcakes to ElCapitan 3168: Change of
config on the menu was not perceived by Clover
3164: The IDE driver has been corrected to work properly in UDMA mode. 3162:
XHCIdra is correctedto turn off the legaci and turn the ports on. 3157: AHCI speed
is increased at times.
3154: Obsession on the InfoPlist patch is prevented. 3147:
BiosBlockIO driver bugs are corrected.
3144: Corrected bugs with reading of the confit and installation from the menu, interchangeof
hanging. 3138: bug with the launch of Windowes.
3128: bug with reading SPD.
3121: Start with exFAT.
3116: A series of installer fixes. 3100: The
possibility of a Yoshi kernel patch.
3090: VboxHFS.efi bug reads the wrong file that is requested. 3086:

Moscow, 2021
Bug with a reading of the poppy addresshanging on the new chipset.

Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
3074: USB Legacy Support hanging. Known initially, but the solutions of different developers were the
opposite and incompatible.
3060: AHCI driver. The patch came from its creators - from Intel.
3057: overlapping the address table and EBDA, causing the inability to start on some BIOS.
3053: Procedures that use macros VA_ARG must have EFIAPI, otherwise bugs are possible. And
really observed! Patch from Intel.
3041: New graphics cardsadded.
3036: The kernel patch has been corrected for 10.10. Written by
Rehabman. 3035: The DSDT patch has been fixed.
And so on... All this not counting amendments to the processes of compilation and installation, in
cosmetics and design, as well as support for new irons and new OSS.
B. Doesn't work.
A. He's a fool.
It's a good place to be. What else is there to answer?
B. Clover installed, but gets a black screen.
A. Os loading takes place in eight stages (see Page 6). Be kind, specify at what stage the stop
takes place. And in yourown account be sure to specify "Installer installer with a choice of such
options."
The most common errors are:
–
With some BOX CsmVideoDxe does not work, remove it;
–
it happens that PatchVBios'Yes leads to a black screen, try totap off,
–
It's worth the Boot. Everything works, but slowly, not enough patience to wait.
For better diagnosis of what is happening, put
<key>Boot</key>
<dict>
<key>Debug</key>
<true/>
IN
fayle config.plist. For gruztoa but tr andsxodio t ocheni dlenno, ns co cy n a q a d abam shagf
fot o n o l i/e fi/CLOVER/is c/debug. l og, z ato no le aunahathaon y i'rot-ue ynformiaqiyu, ho
rhoo'o went. R e alno n nari forryfmi of te t et d eit-u t-uta t-do hoh o a' in gei. Nats i'm
with pe inandzand 3063 epan yf etwy, esf-th f--th h-h-hatha ryziti, t o'r why got-th pee et a
htorana, no o tory you nothmete, hto nroandsxodit.
I see on the screen 6 and nothing else happens.
A. This is the most severe case of iron incompatibility. Now it is no longer found, except with the
AMD processor. Only a programmer who can insert debugging messages into Clover's codes will
be able to diagnose, and do a rebuy for the rebuy until the problem is fully clarified.
Is that to play with the installations of BIOS, sometimes helps. Try boot7 (Clover BiosBlockIO)
instead of the boot file. Orre-installe with the boot1.
B. There is a download only to the text analogue of BIOS with five points, the top - Continue'gt;
A. This means that the boot file has successfully downloaded and is working, but it does not
find the CloverX64.efi file. Whether that section does not see, or even devices - you need to
understand further, walking through the options of this menu.
160
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
HFSPlus.efi, and you have Clover installed on the HFS section. It's strange, actually, why do UEFI
download from the HFS section.
V. Usdanced Clover on a flash drive, loaded with it, and do not see his HDD.
A. First, HDD should be inserted into the Sata0 port. This may be fixed in the future.
5
Second,
I understand, if you have a well-working Ham, Himera, CRS, in short, BBH (Bwiped on
Bukwu X),you don't want to kill him, but want to try Clover, then this act seems natural.
Try the boot7 file as well if you have some unusual SATA/SAS/RAID controller.
B. At UEF-download I do not see a section with Makosia, only legasi.
A. This means that the folder /EFI/CLOVER/drivers/UEFI does not have HFSPlus.efi or its
legal counterpart VboxHFS.efi.
B. At UEFI-booting Windowes looks like a legasi, although it is EFI.
A. Same, missing driver NTFS.efi
It's a good place to be. These two drivers are missing from the repository for licensing reasons, you
need to find this file somewhere on the network. Now there is a legal analogue GrubNTFS.efi.
Available in Clover's installer.
B. Put his native resolution in the loader, but the screen is in a black frame.
A. There's no way to fix it. In any case, Clover's developers could not come up with anything, and
no one will answer this question. There is one option: if there is a UEFI BIOS then it is necessary
to make a UEFI-zagruzka, and sew a video card to UEF VideoBIOS.
- OS: Windows 8 WHQL
- CSM: Never
- Full screen logo: Disabled
Nothing can be done for a lega/download. If you don't like the mourning frame, make a lower
resolution.
B. When you try to swellthe OSI hangs on the black screen
A. At this point there is a patch of DDDT with your mask. Yes, ideally it should not hang.
Clover would like to fix all this, but alas, the number of bad options is not
even a review. And I strongly recommend using the latest version of Clover, because such bugs
from time to time are found and corrected.
And then there's the option: put KernelPM'true
5 There was such an error in the SATa driver from Intel, has now been fixed.
161
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
B. The core begins to load, but panics after the tenth line Unable To find a driver for this platform
"ACPI".
A. It's missing or wrong DDDT. If you can't get a car, add a manual DDDT. Notice auto patch
options, as well as ReuseFFFF keys and DropOEM_DSM.
B. The system starts to load, but stops at still waiting for root device....
A. In addition to the usual for such cases of advice to include AHCI in BIOS, or if not, to find the
right driver (in the sense of a cupcake) for your IDE controller, there is still advice to load with
the key WithKexts (in the new revisions Of NoCaches), thenthe download will go slower, and the
controller will have time to turn on. By the way, such an error can occur only if Clover and the
system are on different devices.
B. The system is loaded before the message: Waiting for DSMOS....
A. No FakeSMC. Maybe with Chameleon, you had this cupcake in Extre, and Clover doesn't
see that folder. It has a folder /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/10.x or more. Don't forget the InjectKexts
key. The default is disabled!
In the second stage andthe installation Clover does not know the version of the system (it is not yet
defined), so put FakeSMC in the folder /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/Other/
In the new versions, the InjectKexts key has a "Detect" value, which must automatically handle
this situation, check whatis written about your confit.
B. The system passes this message, but nothing changes further, although Winchester buzzes as
if the system is loaded.
A. Typical situation where the graphics card is not turned on. Try GraphicInjector'Yes in the confit,
or vice versa . . . In the second version of Radeons are launched at the "native factory" that allows
you to even work in the system, with a few exceptions, For example, DVDplayer will not work.
B. The system is loaded to the message: "Bluetooth controller....
A. Same. See the previous paragraph. It has nothing to do with the synesub.
B. The system is loaded, everything is fine, but the System Profiler errors ...
A. In general, it's cosmetics, the functionality is not affected.
Memory. There are two magnitudes, nominal and actual, and they often don't match. What show in
the profile? I put the first one - yelled that it was wrong. Put the second, etee silenced, other users
yelled that it is wrong....
See page 47 how to write your memory values in the confit.
Conclusion
Clover, of course, is far from perfect, but the process of improving programs is never
complete. There will be new revisions, there will be new functions, and for now so.
Clover's biggest flaw is that he's trying to be versatile. The programmer canmake his own
version from the source, suitable for his iron.
162
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Despite the presence of automation, instructions, descriptions and a mass of advice from the
knowrkov. Chameleon works at the expense of BIOS drivers, and therefore he has a better chance
of running on an arbitrary iron, but only no one keeps statistics, in what percentage of cases Clover
works better.
Clover's development is over, but the project is not dead, it continues to be, and will
continue to develop.
Chameleon.
Great respect to all the creators of this project, which made possible Mac on the usual P.C.
Clover borrowed a lot of technology from him, for it was created for the same purposes (injection
graphics cards, efi-stings, patch of aspi, generator sddt, sambios patch, but only all this is already
on a completely different level).
I was also among the Chameleon developers and offered their patches/improvements,
however, the admins of the project ignored me. There are a lot of flaws and just bugs that have
not been fixed. http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1106 When Chameleon
doesn't work, they don't talk about it, they just ignore it.
The first blow came inthe spring of 2011, when the 10.7 system came out, and Chameleon
was unable to load it. Then Gyk discovered that the system could load the XRS, which is
an EFI-loader.
The second blow occurred in January 2013, when iMessage required ROM and MLB
variables in NVRAM to activate. Clover overcame this back in September, but with a small error in
the DLline, which was corrected only in January.
The principle of work is quite different. It took Mecklort and Cosmo1 a month to get over that bar.
Since that winter, the number of Clover users has exceeded the number of Chameleon users for the
first time. "Everything works with the chameleon!"
The third blow chameleons ignored, like "no and don't need."
10.7 for some reason. There is no one to investigate why and how it turned out to be. Meklort has
retired, the rest of the developers in the team can only make new video card names. Clover was
theonly loader with whom hibernation works at least in the 10.9 system.
I can also remind you that the problems of floating regions, the name of the slot, and many
not particularly necessary trifles are not solved with Chameleon. In addition, chameleon has a lot of
errors that there is simply no one to fix.
The last strike occurred in June 2014. Apple has released the 10.10 Yosemite system that
Clover can download, and the necessary patches have already been introduced, starting with Audit
2695. But for Chameleon it seems to have come to an end... Looking back at the history, you
realize that the dawncan not be, everything in this world is possible, it is possible that one of the
developers will still overcome this bar, and some of the fans will remain with Chameleon.
Happy to stay!
YES: Yes, we have dealt with this problem, Chameleon now loads Josyu, but for some
reason there were problems with 10.9.4, problems with NVRAM, and therefore with the IMesage.
163
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
Another blow, the adventof the apfs.
Chimera is a stripped-down HaMeleon brunch, with its theme and "other video inject."
That is, for the factory graphics card you need to apply A DDDT patch or cupcake-type natita.
Revobut is a stripped-down Chameleon in which you need to compile your DSDT. That is,
everyone should compile a revout for sebya. According to the creators (Master Chief and his
"daughter" Revogirl) it allows to reduce the download time while reading the DDDT file. The
restof the improvements are even more questionable.
Yes, Chameleon has a right to life because he is a purely legosy loader, and can work
where Clover has a problem with legasi-but, old computers, left chipset, and the like. Some
people work, and others don't even try, they just useready-made solutions with Chameleon.
Anyway, I'm tired of talking about Chameleon. I've been proving for years that Clover's
better, someone's never convinced, I don't care. The subject is closed.
Other EFI loaders.
TheXRS download was announced in 2009, the team gathered and even created a project
site.
The project was frozen, the team ran away.
The star hour of the project came when in the spring of 2011 Gyk installed 10.7 with the help of
CRS, which was impossible with Chameleon, as I said above. Tom came to life, but did
not cooperate, but only allowed the testers to report to the IRS their reports and wishes. Some of
them tried CRS, and became his ardent adherents: "What to do shit, you would better help Tom
with his loader. He's a perfectly adequate guy, and listens to the criticism." And I, while
alone, began to make a loader based on THE DU,and in the first month got some results better
than CRS. War so war, I did not give my know-how to Tom. And a small initial advantage is the
support of Russian users, which are more than any other.
In Clover version 1, an interface from Ninzi was used that "stolen" it from an early version
of CRS. In this situation, It was impossible to develop Clover, and in early 2012, when I realized
all the necessary technologies, I started making Clover's interface version 2 based on the rEFIt
project, with open source. I want to note that the CRS comes from him, so the claim is more to
him, which Tom has the right to close the sources if he uses the open. Now Clover has become
licensed clean, and has risen to the levelofme when you could talk about competition. "XPC has
so far outd determined no one infunctionality." However, he still had an unresolved problem with
the system-type, which in the case of the laptop interfered with sleep. As well as board-id, which
interfered on some configurations with the installation of the system 10.7.
164
Clover-colored khaki. Version 5.1, Audit 5128
Moscow, 2021
There was no problem, because I initially chose other patches, according to other ideas, and that of
them so influenced was completely unobvious, looking into my sources. I knew, but I decided not
to explain it to anyone. Works in Clover, so you'll use Clover.
This is how the bareBoot project was born. The author of SunKi, an ardent supporter
of CRS and Tom's best assistant in his project, decided to get to the truth. but I never made
any suggestions to improve Clover, to further promote it. However, by this time Dmaar had
already made a UEFI download, and the association Of CloverEFI'GUI was not applicable. He
started with a clean Blow, and began to add patches from Clover step by step, checking what
was affecting (and could start with a ready-made Clover!). Meanwhile, Tom stopped doing the
project,and there were no trump cards in thebarbut to attract users. Okay, we're going to do a
purely text interface at Clover, if anyone's allergic to graphics. In the meantime, in Clover there
are new poundsthat are not easy to copy in the barbut, in particular patches of DSDT, mux and
kernels, not to mention the UEFI-boot.
Users were left to shrug their shoulders "Why do you need a barbut at all?".
Meanwhile, in the worldof hakintosha there was another notablebuild-up. And
here we see a loader Ozmosis, which is sewn into the BIOS, and contains modules taken from
Clover. However, in my opinion, all this is true, but if nothing is updated.
Recently, King dropped another phrase "Oz is unacceptable for a laptopin."
With the release of the ElCapitan system, the app everanother beta, the Osmosis loader also
experienced a shock.
